217 
218 void Spell::EffectEmpty(SpellEffectIndex /*eff_idx*/)
219 {
220  // NOT NEED ANY IMPLEMENTATION CODE, EFFECT POSISBLE USED AS MARKER OR CLIENT INFORM
221 }
222 
223 void Spell::EffectNULL(SpellEffectIndex /*eff_idx*/)
224 {
225  DEBUG_LOG("WORLD: Spell Effect DUMMY");
226 }
227 
228 void Spell::EffectUnused(SpellEffectIndex /*eff_idx*/)
229 {
230  // NOT USED BY ANY SPELL OR USELESS OR IMPLEMENTED IN DIFFERENT WAY IN MANGOS
231 }
232 
233 void Spell::EffectInstaKill(SpellEffectIndex /*eff_idx*/)
234 {
235  if (!unitTarget || !unitTarget->IsAlive())
236  return;
237 
238  // Demonic Sacrifice
239  if (m_spellInfo->Id == 18788 && unitTarget->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_UNIT)
240  {
241  uint32 entry = unitTarget->GetEntry();
242  uint32 spellID;
243  switch (entry)
244  {
245  case 416: spellID = 18789; break; // imp
246  case 417: spellID = 18792; break; // fellhunter
247  case 1860: spellID = 18790; break; // void
248  case 1863: spellID = 18791; break; // succubus
249  case 17252: spellID = 35701; break; // fellguard
250  default:
251  sLog.outError("EffectInstaKill: Unhandled creature entry (%u) case.", entry);
252  return;
253  }
254 
255  m_caster->CastSpell(m_caster, spellID, TRIGGERED_OLD_TRIGGERED);
256  }
257 
258  if (m_caster == unitTarget) // prevent interrupt message
259  finish();
260 
261  WorldObject* caster = GetCastingObject(); // we need the original casting object
262 
263  WorldPacket data(SMSG_SPELLINSTAKILLLOG, (8 + 8 + 4));
264  data << (caster && caster->GetTypeId() != TYPEID_GAMEOBJECT ? m_caster->GetObjectGuid() : ObjectGuid()); // Caster GUID
265  data << unitTarget->GetObjectGuid(); // Victim GUID
266  data << uint32(m_spellInfo->Id);
267  m_caster->SendMessageToSet(data, true);
268 
269  Unit::DealDamage(m_caster, unitTarget, unitTarget->GetHealth(), nullptr, INSTAKILL, SPELL_SCHOOL_MASK_NORMAL, m_spellInfo, false);
270 }
271 
272 void Spell::EffectEnvironmentalDMG(SpellEffectIndex eff_idx)
273 {
274  uint32 absorb = 0;
275  int32 resist = 0;
276 
277  // Note: this hack with damage replace required until GO casting not implemented
278  // environment damage spells already have around enemies targeting but this not help in case nonexistent GO casting support
279  // currently each enemy selected explicitly and self cast damage, we prevent apply self casted spell bonuses/etc
280  damage = m_spellInfo->CalculateSimpleValue(eff_idx);
281 
282  m_caster->CalculateDamageAbsorbAndResist(m_caster, GetSpellSchoolMask(m_spellInfo), SPELL_DIRECT_DAMAGE, damage, &absorb, &resist, false, !m_spellInfo->HasAttribute(SPELL_ATTR_EX5_NO_PARTIAL_RESISTS));
283 
284  Unit::SendSpellNonMeleeDamageLog(m_trueCaster, m_caster, m_spellInfo->Id, damage, GetSpellSchoolMask(m_spellInfo), absorb, resist, false, 0, false);
285  if (m_caster->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_PLAYER)
286  ((Player*)m_caster)->EnvironmentalDamage(DAMAGE_FIRE, damage);
287 }
288 
289 void Spell::EffectSchoolDMG(SpellEffectIndex eff_idx)
290 {
291  if (unitTarget && unitTarget->IsAlive())
292  {
293  switch (m_spellInfo->SpellFamilyName)
294  {
295  case SPELLFAMILY_GENERIC:
296  {
297  // Gore
298  if (m_spellInfo->SpellIconID == 2269)
299  {
300  damage += urand() % 2 ? damage : 0;
301  }
302 
303  switch (m_spellInfo->Id) // better way to check unknown
304  {
305  // Meteor like spells (divided damage to targets)
306  case 24340: case 26558: case 28884: // Meteor
307  case 36837: case 38903: case 41276: // Meteor
308  case 26789: // Shard of the Fallen Star
309  case 40810: case 43267: case 43268: // Saber Lash
310  case 42384: // Brutal Swipe
311  {
312  uint32 count = 0;
313  for (TargetList::const_iterator ihit = m_UniqueTargetInfo.begin(); ihit != m_UniqueTargetInfo.end(); ++ihit)
314  if (ihit->effectHitMask & (1 << eff_idx))
315  ++count;
316 
317  damage /= count; // divide to all targets
318  break;
319  }
320  // percent from health with min
321  case 25599: // Thundercrash
322  {
323  damage = unitTarget->GetHealth() / 2;
324  if (damage < 200)
325  damage = 200;
326  break;
327  }
328  case 33666: // Sonic Boom - Normal
329  case 38795: // Sonic Boom - Heroic
330  {
331  damage = (unitTarget->GetMaxHealth() * (m_spellInfo->Id == 33666 ? 90 : 95)) / 100;
332  break;
333  }
334  case 33671: // Shatter - Gruul
335  {
336  float x, y, z;
337  unitTarget->GetPosition(x, y, z);
338  damage = (20 - m_caster->GetDistance(x, y, z, DIST_CALC_COMBAT_REACH))*(damage / 20);
339  break;
340  }
341  // Lightning Strike
342  case 37841:
343  if (unitTarget->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_PLAYER && unitTarget->HasAura(37830)) // Repolarized Magneto Sphere
344  ((Player*)unitTarget)->KilledMonsterCredit(21910);
345  break;
346  // Cataclysmic Bolt
347  case 38441:
348  damage = unitTarget->GetMaxHealth() / 2;
349  break;
350  case 38977: // Spore Quake Effect
351  if (roll_chance_i(33))
352  m_caster->CastSpell(unitTarget, 39002, TRIGGERED_OLD_TRIGGERED); // Spore Quake Knockdown
353  break;
354  case 39384:
355  {
356  if (eff_idx == 0)
357  {
358  if (unitTarget->GetFaction() == 1690)
359  damage = 10000;
360  else
361  damage = 0;
362  }
363  else
364  {
365  if (unitTarget->GetFaction() == 1689)
366  damage = 10000;
367  else
368  damage = 0;
369  }
370  break;
371  }
372  case 40065: // Apexis Reprisal
373  {
374  damage = unitTarget->GetMaxHealth() / 3;
375  break;
376  }
377  case 43657: // Electrical Storm - Akil'zon
378  {
379  if (Aura* aura = m_caster->GetAura(43648, EFFECT_INDEX_1))
380  damage *= aura->GetAuraTicks();
381  break;
382  }
383  }
384  break;
385  }
386 
387  case SPELLFAMILY_MAGE:
388  {
389  // Arcane Blast
390  if (m_spellInfo->SpellFamilyFlags & uint64(0x20000000))
391  m_caster->CastSpell(m_caster, 36032, TRIGGERED_INSTANT_CAST);
392  break;
393  }
394  case SPELLFAMILY_WARRIOR:
395  {
396  // Bloodthirst
397  if (m_spellInfo->SpellFamilyFlags & uint64(0x40000000000))
398  {
399  damage = uint32(damage * (m_caster->GetTotalAttackPowerValue(BASE_ATTACK)) / 100);
400  }
401  // Shield Slam
402  else if (m_spellInfo->SpellFamilyFlags & uint64(0x100000000))
403  damage += int32(m_caster->GetShieldBlockValue());
404  break;
405  }
406  case SPELLFAMILY_WARLOCK:
407  {
408  // Incinerate Rank 1 & 2
409  if ((m_spellInfo->SpellFamilyFlags & uint64(0x00004000000000)) && m_spellInfo->SpellIconID == 2128)
410  {
411  // Incinerate does more dmg (dmg*0.25) if the target is Immolated.
412  if (unitTarget->HasAuraState(AURA_STATE_CONFLAGRATE))
413  damage += int32(damage * 0.25);
414  }
415  // Conflagrate - consumes Immolate
416  else if (m_spellInfo->TargetAuraState == AURA_STATE_CONFLAGRATE)
417  {
418  // for caster applied auras only
419  Unit::AuraList const& mPeriodic = unitTarget->GetAurasByType(SPELL_AURA_PERIODIC_DAMAGE);
420  for (auto i : mPeriodic)
421  {
422  if (i->GetCasterGuid() == m_caster->GetObjectGuid() &&
423  // Immolate
424  i->GetSpellProto()->IsFitToFamily(SPELLFAMILY_WARLOCK, uint64(0x0000000000000004)))
425  {
426  unitTarget->RemoveAurasByCasterSpell(i->GetId(), m_caster->GetObjectGuid());
427  break;
428  }
429  }
430  }
431  break;
432  }
433  case SPELLFAMILY_PRIEST:
434  {
435  break;
436  }
437  case SPELLFAMILY_DRUID:
438  {
439  // Ferocious Bite
440  if ((m_spellInfo->SpellFamilyFlags & uint64(0x000800000)) && m_spellInfo->SpellVisual == 6587)
441  {
442  // converts each extra point of energy into additional damage
443  damage += int32(m_caster->GetPower(POWER_ENERGY) * m_spellInfo->DmgMultiplier[eff_idx]);
444  m_caster->SetPower(POWER_ENERGY, 0);
445  // scaled AP bonus
446  if (m_caster->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_PLAYER)
447  damage += int32(m_caster->GetTotalAttackPowerValue(BASE_ATTACK) * 0.03f * m_caster->GetComboPoints());
448  break;
449  }
450  // L5 Arcane Charge - Promenade Sentinal 23394
451  if (m_spellInfo->Id == 41360)
452  {
453  damage = unitTarget->GetMaxHealth();
454  break;
455  }
456  break;
457  }
458  case SPELLFAMILY_ROGUE:
459  {
460  // Envenom
461  if (m_caster->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_PLAYER && (m_spellInfo->SpellFamilyFlags & uint64(0x800000000)))
462  {
463  // consume from stack dozes not more that have combo-points
464  if (uint32 combo = m_caster->GetComboPoints())
465  {
466  Aura* poison = nullptr;
467  // Lookup for Deadly poison (only attacker applied)
468  Unit::AuraList const& auras = unitTarget->GetAurasByType(SPELL_AURA_PERIODIC_DAMAGE);
469  for (auto aura : auras)
470  {
471  if (aura->GetSpellProto()->SpellFamilyName == SPELLFAMILY_ROGUE &&
472  aura->GetSpellProto()->SpellFamilyFlags & uint64(0x10000) &&
473  aura->GetSpellProto()->SpellVisual == 5100 &&
474  aura->GetCasterGuid() == m_caster->GetObjectGuid())
475  {
476  poison = aura;
477  break;
478  }
479  }
480  // count consumed deadly poison doses at target
481  if (poison)
482  {
483  uint32 spellId = poison->GetId();
484  uint32 doses = poison->GetStackAmount();
485  if (doses > combo)
486  doses = combo;
487 
488  unitTarget->RemoveAuraHolderFromStack(spellId, doses, m_caster->GetObjectGuid());
489 
490  damage *= doses;
491  damage += int32(((Player*)m_caster)->GetTotalAttackPowerValue(BASE_ATTACK) * 0.03f * doses);
492  }
493  // Eviscerate and Envenom Bonus Damage (item set effect)
494  if (m_caster->GetDummyAura(37169))
495  damage += m_caster->GetComboPoints() * 40;
496  }
497  }
498  // Eviscerate
499  else if ((m_spellInfo->SpellFamilyFlags & uint64(0x00020000)) && m_caster->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_PLAYER)
500  {
501  if (uint32 combo = m_caster->GetComboPoints())
502  {
503  damage += int32(m_caster->GetTotalAttackPowerValue(BASE_ATTACK) * combo * 0.03f);
504 
505  // Eviscerate and Envenom Bonus Damage (item set effect)
506  if (m_caster->GetDummyAura(37169))
507  damage += combo * 40;
508  }
509  }
510  break;
511  }
512  case SPELLFAMILY_HUNTER:
513  {
514  // Steady Shot
515  if (m_spellInfo->SpellFamilyFlags & uint64(0x100000000))
516  {
517  bool found = false;
518 
519  // check dazed affect
520  Unit::AuraList const& decSpeedList = unitTarget->GetAurasByType(SPELL_AURA_MOD_DECREASE_SPEED);
521  for (Unit::AuraList::const_iterator iter = decSpeedList.begin(); iter != decSpeedList.end(); ++iter)
522  {
523  if ((*iter)->GetSpellProto()->SpellIconID == 15 && (*iter)->GetSpellProto()->Dispel == 0)
524  {
525  found = true;
526  break;
527  }
528  }
529 
530  if (found)
531  damage += CalculateSpellEffectValue(eff_idx, unitTarget);
532 
533  int32 base = irand((int32)m_caster->GetBaseWeaponDamage(RANGED_ATTACK, MINDAMAGE), (int32)m_caster->GetBaseWeaponDamage(RANGED_ATTACK, MAXDAMAGE));
534  damage += int32(float(base) / m_caster->GetAttackTime(RANGED_ATTACK) * 2800);
535  }
536  break;
537  }
538  case SPELLFAMILY_PALADIN:
539  {
540  // Judgement of Vengeance
541  if ((m_spellInfo->SpellFamilyFlags & uint64(0x800000000)) && m_spellInfo->SpellIconID == 2292)
542  {
543  // Get stack of Holy Vengeance on the target added by caster
544  uint32 stacks = 0;
545  Unit::AuraList const& auras = unitTarget->GetAurasByType(SPELL_AURA_PERIODIC_DAMAGE);
546  for (auto aura : auras)
547  {
548  if ((aura->GetId() == 31803) && aura->GetCasterGuid() == m_caster->GetObjectGuid())
549  {
550  stacks = aura->GetStackAmount();
551  break;
552  }
553  }
554  if (!stacks)
555  // No damage if the target isn't affected by this
556  damage = -1;
557  else
558  damage *= stacks;
559  }
560  switch (m_spellInfo->Id)
561  {
562  case 20467: // Judgement of Command
563  case 20963:
564  case 20964:
565  case 20965:
566  case 20966:
567  case 27171:
568  if (!unitTarget->IsStunned())
569  damage /= 2;
570  break;
571  }
572  break;
573  }
574  }
575 
576  if (damage >= 0)
577  m_damagePerEffect[eff_idx] = CalculateSpellEffectDamage(unitTarget, damage);
578  }
579 }
580 
581 void Spell::EffectDummy(SpellEffectIndex eff_idx)
582 {
583  // selection by spell family
584  switch (m_spellInfo->SpellFamilyName)
585  {
586  case SPELLFAMILY_GENERIC:
587  {
588  switch (m_spellInfo->Id)
589  {
590  case 3360: // Curse of the Eye
591  {
592  if (unitTarget)
593  m_caster->CastSpell(unitTarget, ((unitTarget->getGender() == GENDER_MALE) ? 10651 : 10653), TRIGGERED_OLD_TRIGGERED);
594 
595  return;
596  }
597  case 7671: // Transformation (human<->worgen)
598  {
599  if (unitTarget) // Transform Visual
600  unitTarget->CastSpell(unitTarget, 24085, TRIGGERED_OLD_TRIGGERED);
601 
602  return;
603  }
604  case 8063: // Deviate Fish
605  {
606  if (m_caster->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_PLAYER)
607  {
608  // 8064 = Sleepy | 8065 = Invigorate | 8066 = Shrink | 8067 = Party Time! | 8068 = Healthy Spirit
609  const uint32 spell_list[5] = {8064, 8065, 8066, 8067, 8068};
610  m_caster->CastSpell(m_caster, spell_list[urand(0, 4)], TRIGGERED_OLD_TRIGGERED, nullptr);
611  }
612 
613  return;
614  }
615  case 8213: // Savory Deviate Delight
616  {
617  if (m_caster->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_PLAYER)
618  m_caster->CastSpell(m_caster, (urand(0, 1)
619  ? (m_caster->getGender() == GENDER_MALE ? 8219 : 8220) // Flip Out - ninja
620  : (m_caster->getGender() == GENDER_MALE ? 8221 : 8222)), TRIGGERED_OLD_TRIGGERED, nullptr); // Yaaarrrr - pirate
621 
622  return;
623  }
624  case 8344: // Gnomish Universal Remote (ItemID: 7506)
625  {
626  if (m_CastItem && unitTarget)
627  {
628  // 8345 - Control the machine | 8346 = Malfunction the machine (root) | 8347 = Taunt/enrage the machine
629  const uint32 spell_list[3] = { 8345, 8346, 8347 };
630  m_caster->CastSpell(unitTarget, spell_list[urand(0, 2)], TRIGGERED_OLD_TRIGGERED, m_CastItem);
631  }
632 
633  return;
634  }
635  case 8606: // Summon Cyclonian
636  {
637  if (!(m_targets.m_targetMask & TARGET_FLAG_DEST_LOCATION))
638  return;
639 
640  float x, y, z;
641  m_targets.getDestination(x, y, z); // database loaded coordinates due to target type
642  m_caster->SummonCreature(6239, x, y, z, 0.0f, TEMPSPAWN_TIMED_OOC_DESPAWN, 30 * IN_MILLISECONDS);
643 
644  return;
645  }
646  case 9012: // Attract Rift Spawn
647  {
648  if (!unitTarget || !unitTarget->HasAura(9032))
649  return;
650 
651  unitTarget->CastSpell(unitTarget, 9010, TRIGGERED_NONE);
652  return;
653  }
654  case 9976: // Polly Eats the E.C.A.C.
655  {
656  if (unitTarget && unitTarget->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_UNIT)
657  {
658  // Summon Polly Jr.
659  unitTarget->CastSpell(unitTarget, 9998, TRIGGERED_OLD_TRIGGERED);
660  ((Creature*)unitTarget)->ForcedDespawn(100);
661  }
662 
663  return;
664  }
665  case 10254: // Stone Dwarf Awaken Visual
666  {
667  if (m_caster->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_UNIT) // see spell 10255 (aura dummy)
668  {
669  m_caster->clearUnitState(UNIT_STAT_ROOT);
670  m_caster->RemoveFlag(UNIT_FIELD_FLAGS, UNIT_FLAG_IMMUNE_TO_PLAYER | UNIT_FLAG_IMMUNE_TO_NPC | UNIT_FLAG_UNINTERACTIBLE);
671  }
672 
673  return;
674  }
675  case 12975: // Last Stand
676  {
677  int32 healthModSpellBasePoints0 = int32(m_caster->GetMaxHealth() * 0.3);
678  m_caster->CastCustomSpell(m_caster, 12976, &healthModSpellBasePoints0, nullptr, nullptr, TRIGGERED_OLD_TRIGGERED, nullptr);
679 
680  return;
681  }
682  case 13006: // Gnomish Shrink Ray (ItemID: 10716)
683  {
684  if (unitTarget && m_CastItem)
685  {
686  uint32 roll = urand(0, 99);
687  // These rates are hella random; someone feel free to correct them
688  if (roll < 3) // Whole party will grow
689  m_caster->CastSpell(m_caster, 13004, TRIGGERED_OLD_TRIGGERED);
690  else if (roll < 6) // Whole party will shrink
691  m_caster->CastSpell(m_caster, 13010, TRIGGERED_OLD_TRIGGERED);
692  else if (roll < 9) // Whole enemy 'team' will grow
693  m_caster->CastSpell(unitTarget, 13004, TRIGGERED_OLD_TRIGGERED);
694  else if (roll < 12) // Whole enemy 'team' will shrink
695  m_caster->CastSpell(unitTarget, 13010, TRIGGERED_OLD_TRIGGERED);
696  else if (roll < 24) // Caster will shrink
697  m_caster->CastSpell(m_caster, 13003, TRIGGERED_OLD_TRIGGERED);
698  else // Enemy target will shrink
699  m_caster->CastSpell(unitTarget, 13003, TRIGGERED_OLD_TRIGGERED);
700  }
701 
702  return;
703  }
704  case 13120: // Net-O-Matic
705  {
706  if (unitTarget && m_CastItem)
707  {
708  uint32 roll = urand(0, 99);
709  if (roll < 2) // 2% for 30 sec self root (off-like chance unknown)
710  m_caster->CastSpell(unitTarget, 16566, TRIGGERED_OLD_TRIGGERED, m_CastItem);
711  else if (roll < 4) // 2% for 20 sec root, charge to target (off-like chance unknown)
712  m_caster->CastSpell(unitTarget, 13119, TRIGGERED_OLD_TRIGGERED, m_CastItem);
713  else // normal root
714  m_caster->CastSpell(unitTarget, 13099, TRIGGERED_OLD_TRIGGERED, m_CastItem);
715  }
716 
717  return;
718  }
719  case 13180: // Gnomish Mind Control Cap (ItemID: 10726)
720  {
721  if (unitTarget && m_CastItem)
722  {
723  uint32 roll = urand(0, 9);
724  if (roll == 1 && unitTarget->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_PLAYER)
725  unitTarget->CastSpell(m_caster, 13181, TRIGGERED_OLD_TRIGGERED, m_CastItem);
726  else if (roll)
727  m_caster->CastSpell(unitTarget, 13181, TRIGGERED_OLD_TRIGGERED, m_CastItem);
728  }
729 
730  return;
731  }
732  case 13489:
733  {
734  if (unitTarget)
735  unitTarget->CastSpell(unitTarget, 14744, TRIGGERED_OLD_TRIGGERED);
736 
737  return;
738  }
739  case 13567: // Dummy Trigger
740  {
741  // can be used for different aura triggering, so select by aura
742  if (m_triggeredByAuraSpell && unitTarget)
743  {
744  switch (m_triggeredByAuraSpell->Id)
745  {
746  case 26467: // Persistent Shield
747  m_caster->CastCustomSpell(unitTarget, 26470, &damage, nullptr, nullptr, TRIGGERED_OLD_TRIGGERED);
748  break;
749  default:
750  sLog.outError("EffectDummy: Non-handled case for spell 13567 for triggered aura %u", m_triggeredByAuraSpell->Id);
751  break;
752  }
753  }
754 
755  return;
756  }
757  case 14537: // Six Demon Bag
758  {
759  if (unitTarget)
760  {
761  uint32 roll = urand(0, 99);
762  if (roll < 25) // Fireball (25% chance)
763  m_caster->CastSpell(unitTarget, 15662, TRIGGERED_OLD_TRIGGERED, m_CastItem);
764  else if (roll < 50) // Frostbolt (25% chance)
765  m_caster->CastSpell(unitTarget, 11538, TRIGGERED_OLD_TRIGGERED, m_CastItem);
766  else if (roll < 70) // Chain Lighting (20% chance)
767  m_caster->CastSpell(unitTarget, 21179, TRIGGERED_OLD_TRIGGERED, m_CastItem);
768  else if (roll < 85) // Enveloping Winds (15% chance)
769  m_caster->CastSpell(unitTarget, 25189, TRIGGERED_OLD_TRIGGERED, m_CastItem);
770  else if (roll < 90) // Summon Felhund minion (5% chance)
771  m_caster->CastSpell(m_caster, 14642, TRIGGERED_OLD_TRIGGERED, m_CastItem);
772  else if (roll < 97) // Polymorph (7% to target, 10% chance total)
773  m_caster->CastSpell(unitTarget, 14621, TRIGGERED_OLD_TRIGGERED, m_CastItem);
774  else // Polymorph (3% to self, backfire, 10% chance total)
775  m_caster->CastSpell(m_caster, 14621, TRIGGERED_OLD_TRIGGERED, m_CastItem);
776  }
777 
778  return;
779  }
780  case 15998: // Capture Worg Pup
781  case 29435: // Capture Female Kaliri Hatchling
782  {
783  if (unitTarget && unitTarget->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_UNIT)
784  ((Creature*)unitTarget)->ForcedDespawn();
785 
786  return;
787  }
788  case 16049: // Emberseer Growing
789  {
790  if (UnitAI* ai = m_caster->AI())
791  ai->SendAIEvent(AI_EVENT_CUSTOM_A, m_caster, m_caster);
792  return;
793  }
794  case 16378: // Temperature Reading
795  {
796  if (!unitTarget || !m_caster->IsPlayer())
797  return;
798 
799  switch (unitTarget->GetGUIDLow()) // sadly each spawn does different texts - meant to be db guids
800  {
801  case 23712: // Z: -241.0724
802  {
803  static std::vector<int32> textIds = {-1010012, -1010013, -1010014};
804  DoScriptText(textIds[urand(0, textIds.size() - 1)], unitTarget, m_caster);
805  break;
806  }
807  case 23713: // Z: -265.2025
808  {
809  static std::vector<int32> textIds = {-1010009, -1010010, -1010011};
810  DoScriptText(textIds[urand(0, textIds.size() - 1)], unitTarget, m_caster);
811  break;
812  }
813  case 23714: // Z: -240.8598
814  {
815  static std::vector<int32> textIds = {-1010015, -1010016, -1010017};
816  DoScriptText(textIds[urand(0, textIds.size() - 1)], unitTarget, m_caster);
817  break;
818  }
819  case 23715: // Z: -246.8467
820  {
821  static std::vector<int32> textIds = {-1010015, -1010016, -1010017};
822  DoScriptText(textIds[urand(0, textIds.size() - 1)], unitTarget, m_caster);
823  break;
824  }
825  case 23716: // Z: -186.0754 quest completion one
826  {
827  static std::vector<int32> textIds = {-1010018, -1010019, -1010020, -1010021};
828  DoScriptText(textIds[urand(0, textIds.size() - 1)], unitTarget, m_caster);
829  Player* player = static_cast<Player*>(m_caster);
830  player->RewardPlayerAndGroupAtEventCredit(unitTarget->GetEntry(), unitTarget);
831  break;
832  }
833  default:
834  {
835  sLog.outErrorDb("Database has wrong data for q.974 - guids do not correspond.");
836  break;
837  }
838  }
839 
840  return;
841  }
842  case 16589: // Noggenfogger Elixir
843  {
844  if (m_caster->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_PLAYER)
845  {
846  const uint32 spell_list[3] = {16595, 16593, 16591};
847  m_caster->CastSpell(m_caster, spell_list[urand(0, 2)], TRIGGERED_OLD_TRIGGERED, nullptr);
848  }
849 
850  return;
851  }
852  case 17009: // Voodoo
853  {
854  if (unitTarget && unitTarget->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_PLAYER)
855  {
856  // 16707 = Hex | 16708 = Hex | 16709 = Hex | 16711 = Grow | 16712 = Special Brew | 16713 = Ghostly | 16716 = Launch
857  const uint32 spell_list[7] = {16707, 16708, 16709, 16711, 16712, 16713, 16716};
858  m_caster->CastSpell(unitTarget, spell_list[urand(0, 6)], TRIGGERED_OLD_TRIGGERED, nullptr, nullptr, m_originalCasterGUID, m_spellInfo);
859  }
860 
861  return;
862  }
863  case 17251: // Spirit Healer Res
864  {
865  if (unitTarget)
866  {
867  Unit* caster = GetAffectiveCaster();
868  if (caster && caster->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_PLAYER)
869  {
870  WorldPacket data(SMSG_SPIRIT_HEALER_CONFIRM, 8);
871  data << unitTarget->GetObjectGuid();
872  ((Player*)caster)->GetSession()->SendPacket(data);
873  }
874  }
875 
876  return;
877  }
878  case 17271: // Test Fetid Skull
879  {
880  // 17269 = Create Resonating Skull | 17270 = Create Bone Dust
881  if (m_caster->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_PLAYER)
882  m_caster->CastSpell(m_caster, (urand(0, 1) ? 17269 : 17270), TRIGGERED_OLD_TRIGGERED);
883 
884  return;
885  }
886  case 17678: // Despawn Spectral Combatants (sic)
887  {
888  if (unitTarget && unitTarget->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_UNIT)
889  {
890  Creature* creatureTarget = (Creature*)unitTarget;
891  if (creatureTarget)
892  creatureTarget->ForcedDespawn(3000);
893  }
894 
895  return;
896  }
897  case 17770: // Wolfshead Helm Energy
898  {
899  m_caster->CastSpell(m_caster, 29940, TRIGGERED_OLD_TRIGGERED, nullptr);
900 
901  return;
902  }
903  case 17950: // Shadow Portal
904  {
905  if (unitTarget)
906  {
907  const uint32 spell_list[6] = {17863, 17939, 17943, 17944, 17946, 17948};
908  m_caster->CastSpell(unitTarget, spell_list[urand(0, 5)], TRIGGERED_OLD_TRIGGERED);
909  }
910 
911  return;
912  }
913  case 18350: // Dummy Trigger
914  {
915  if (m_triggeredByAuraSpell && unitTarget)
916  {
917  switch (m_triggeredByAuraSpell->Id)
918  {
919  case 13810: // Frost Trap Aura
920  {
921  // Need to check casting of entrapment on every pulse
922  // Chose this route so that whole proc system doesnt have to run
923  // IDs are in reverse order because its more likely someone will have max rank
924  float chance = 0.f;
925  uint32 entrapmentIDs[] = { 19388 , 19387, 19184 };
926  for (uint32 spellId : entrapmentIDs)
927  if (SpellAuraHolder* holder = m_caster->GetSpellAuraHolder(spellId))
928  {
929  chance = holder->GetSpellProto()->procChance;
930  break;
931  }
932 
933  if (roll_chance_f(chance))
934  m_caster->CastSpell(unitTarget, 19185, TRIGGERED_OLD_TRIGGERED);
935  break;
936  }
937  case 28821: // Lightning Shield
938  {
939  // Need remove self if Lightning Shield not active
940  Unit::SpellAuraHolderMap const& auras = unitTarget->GetSpellAuraHolderMap();
941  for (const auto& aura : auras)
942  {
943  SpellEntry const* spell = aura.second->GetSpellProto();
944  if (spell->SpellFamilyName == SPELLFAMILY_SHAMAN
945  && spell->SpellFamilyFlags & uint64(0x0000000000000400))
946  return;
947  }
948 
949  unitTarget->RemoveAurasDueToSpell(28820);
950  break;
951  }
952  case 28820: // Lightning Shield (The Earthshatterer set trigger after cast Lighting Shield)
953  {
954  // Need remove self if Lightning Shield not active
955  Unit::SpellAuraHolderMap const& auras = unitTarget->GetSpellAuraHolderMap();
956  for (const auto& aura : auras)
957  {
958  SpellEntry const* spell = aura.second->GetSpellProto();
959  if (spell->SpellFamilyName == SPELLFAMILY_SHAMAN &&
960  (spell->SpellFamilyFlags & uint64(0x0000000000000400)))
961  return;
962  }
963  unitTarget->RemoveAurasDueToSpell(28820);
964  return;
965  }
966  case 38443: // Totemic Mastery (Skyshatter Regalia (Shaman Tier 6) - bonus)
967  {
968  if (unitTarget->IsAllTotemSlotsUsed())
969  unitTarget->CastSpell(nullptr, 38437, TRIGGERED_OLD_TRIGGERED, nullptr);
970  else
971  unitTarget->RemoveAurasDueToSpell(38437);
972  return;
973  }
974  case 37594: // Greater Heal Refund
975  {
976  // If your Greater Heal brings the target to full health, you gain $37595s1 mana.
977  if (unitTarget->GetHealth() == unitTarget->GetMaxHealth())
978  m_caster->CastSpell(nullptr, 37595, TRIGGERED_OLD_TRIGGERED);
979  break;
980  }
981  case 37705: // Healing Discount
982  {
983  uint32 spellId = 0;
984  switch (m_caster->getClass())
985  {
986  case CLASS_PALADIN:
987  spellId = 37723;
988  break;
989  case CLASS_PRIEST:
990  spellId = 37706;
991  break;
992  case CLASS_SHAMAN:
993  spellId = 37722;
994  break;
995  case CLASS_DRUID:
996  spellId = 37721;
997  break;
998  }
999  m_caster->CastSpell(nullptr, spellId, TRIGGERED_OLD_TRIGGERED);
1000  break;
1001  }
1002  }
1003  }
1004  return;
1005  }
1006  case 18947: // Baron Geddon - Inferno
1007  {
1008  Aura* aura = m_caster->GetAura(m_triggeredByAuraSpell->Id, EFFECT_INDEX_0);
1009  if (!aura)
1010  return;
1011  int32 damageForTick[8] = { 500, 500, 1000, 1000, 2000, 2000, 3000, 5000 };
1012  m_caster->CastCustomSpell(nullptr, 19698, &damageForTick[aura->GetAuraTicks() - 1], nullptr, nullptr, TRIGGERED_OLD_TRIGGERED);
1013  return;
1014  }
1015  case 19395: // Gordunni Trap
1016  {
1017  if (unitTarget && unitTarget->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_PLAYER)
1018  unitTarget->CastSpell(unitTarget, urand(0, 1) ? 19394 : 11756, TRIGGERED_OLD_TRIGGERED);
1019 
1020  return;
1021  }
1022  case 19411: // Lava Bomb
1023  {
1024  if (unitTarget)
1025  unitTarget->CastSpell(unitTarget, 20494, TRIGGERED_OLD_TRIGGERED);
1026 
1027  return;
1028  }
1029  case 19484:
1030  {
1031  if (unitTarget)
1032  {
1033  unitTarget->SetFlag(UNIT_NPC_FLAGS, UNIT_NPC_FLAG_GOSSIP);
1034  unitTarget->CastSpell(nullptr, 19527, TRIGGERED_OLD_TRIGGERED);
1035  }
1036  return;
1037  }
1038  case 20474: // Lava Bomb
1039  {
1040  if (unitTarget)
1041  unitTarget->CastSpell(unitTarget, 20495, TRIGGERED_OLD_TRIGGERED);
1042 
1043  return;
1044  }
1045  case 19869: // Dragon Orb
1046  {
1047  if (unitTarget && unitTarget->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_PLAYER && !unitTarget->HasAura(23958))
1048  unitTarget->CastSpell(nullptr, 19832, TRIGGERED_OLD_TRIGGERED);
1049 
1050  return;
1051  }
1052  case 20037: // Explode Orb Effect
1053  {
1054  if (unitTarget)
1055  unitTarget->CastSpell(unitTarget, 20038, TRIGGERED_OLD_TRIGGERED);
1056 
1057  return;
1058  }
1059  case 20577: // Cannibalize
1060  {
1061  m_caster->CastSpell(nullptr, 20578, TRIGGERED_NONE);
1062  return;
1063  }
1064  case 21108: // Summon Sons of Flame
1065  {
1066  // Trigger the eight summoning spells for the adds in Ragnaros encounter
1067  for (const uint32 spell : {21110, 21111, 21112, 21113, 21114, 21115, 21116, 21117})
1068  m_caster->CastSpell(m_caster, spell, TRIGGERED_OLD_TRIGGERED, nullptr);
1069  return;
1070  }
1071  case 21147: // Arcane Vacuum
1072  {
1073  if (unitTarget)
1074  {
1075  // Spell used by Azuregos to teleport all the players to him
1076  // This also resets the target threat
1077  if (m_caster->getThreatManager().getThreat(unitTarget))
1078  m_caster->getThreatManager().modifyThreatPercent(unitTarget, -100);
1079 
1080  // cast summon player
1081  m_caster->CastSpell(unitTarget, 21150, TRIGGERED_OLD_TRIGGERED);
1082  }
1083 
1084  return;
1085  }
1086  case 21908: // Lava Burst Randomizer
1087  {
1088  // randomly cast one of the nine Lava Burst spell A to I in Ragnaros encounter
1089  const uint32 spell_list[9] = {21886, 21900, 21901, 21902, 21903, 21904, 21905, 21906, 21907};
1090  m_caster->CastSpell(m_caster, spell_list[urand(0, 8)], TRIGGERED_OLD_TRIGGERED);
1091  return;
1092  }
1093  case 22276: // Elemental Shield
1094  {
1095  const uint32 elemshields[] = { 22277, 22278, 22279, 22280, 22281 };
1096 
1097  for (uint32 spell : elemshields)
1098  if (m_caster->HasAura(spell))
1099  m_caster->RemoveAurasDueToSpell(spell);
1100  m_caster->CastSpell(m_caster, elemshields[urand(0, 4)], TRIGGERED_OLD_TRIGGERED);
1101 
1102  return;
1103  }
1104  case 22282: // Brood Power
1105  {
1106  uint32 broodpowers[] = { 22283, 22285, 22286, 22287, 22288 };
1107 
1108  for (uint32 spell : broodpowers)
1109  if (m_caster->HasAura(spell))
1110  m_caster->RemoveAurasDueToSpell(spell);
1111  m_caster->CastSpell(m_caster, broodpowers[urand(0, 4)], TRIGGERED_OLD_TRIGGERED);
1112 
1113  return;
1114  }
1115  case 22659: // Spawn Drakonid
1116  {
1117  // Spawn drakonids depending on caster color (spawner type)
1118  uint32 spellSummonDrakonid = 0;
1119  switch (m_caster->GetEntry())
1120  {
1121  case 14312: spellSummonDrakonid = 22658; break; // Blue
1122  case 14310: spellSummonDrakonid = 22656; break; // Green
1123  case 14311: spellSummonDrakonid = 22657; break; // Bronze
1124  case 14309: spellSummonDrakonid = 22655; break; // Red
1125  case 14307: spellSummonDrakonid = 22654; break; // Black
1126  default: return;
1127  }
1128  m_caster->CastSpell(m_caster, spellSummonDrakonid, TRIGGERED_OLD_TRIGGERED);
1129  return;
1130  }
1131  case 22664: // Shadowblink
1132  {
1133  if (eff_idx == EFFECT_INDEX_1)
1134  {
1135  // randomly cast one of the nine Shadowblink spell in Nefarian encounter (phase 1)
1136  const uint32 spell_list[9] = {22668, 22669, 22670, 22671, 22672, 22673, 22674, 22675, 22676};
1137  m_caster->CastSpell(nullptr, spell_list[urand(0, 8)], TRIGGERED_OLD_TRIGGERED);
1138  }
1139  return;
1140  }
1141  case 23019: // Crystal Prison Dummy DND
1142  {
1143  if (unitTarget && unitTarget->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_UNIT && unitTarget->IsAlive())
1144  {
1145  Creature* creatureTarget = (Creature*)unitTarget;
1146  if (!creatureTarget->IsPet())
1147  {
1148  creatureTarget->CastSpell(creatureTarget, 23022, TRIGGERED_OLD_TRIGGERED);
1149  creatureTarget->ForcedDespawn();
1150  }
1151  }
1152 
1153  return;
1154  }
1155  case 23074: // Arcanite Dragonling
1156  {
1157  if (m_CastItem)
1158  m_caster->CastSpell(m_caster, 19804, TRIGGERED_OLD_TRIGGERED, m_CastItem);
1159 
1160  return;
1161  }
1162  case 23075: // Mithril Mechanical Dragonling
1163  {
1164  if (m_CastItem)
1165  m_caster->CastSpell(m_caster, 12749, TRIGGERED_OLD_TRIGGERED, m_CastItem);
1166 
1167  return;
1168  }
1169  case 23076: // Mechanical Dragonling
1170  {
1171  if (m_CastItem)
1172  m_caster->CastSpell(m_caster, 4073, TRIGGERED_OLD_TRIGGERED, m_CastItem);
1173 
1174  return;
1175  }
1176  case 23133: // Gnomish Battle Chicken
1177  {
1178  if (m_CastItem)
1179  m_caster->CastSpell(m_caster, 13166, TRIGGERED_OLD_TRIGGERED, m_CastItem);
1180 
1181  return;
1182  }
1183  case 23134: // Goblin Bomb Dispenser
1184  {
1185  if (m_CastItem)
1186  m_caster->CastSpell(m_caster, 13258, TRIGGERED_OLD_TRIGGERED, m_CastItem);
1187 
1188  return;
1189  }
1190  case 23138: // Gate of Shazzrah
1191  {
1192  if (!unitTarget || m_scriptValue > 0)
1193  return;
1194  m_scriptValue = 1; // mark as executed
1195 
1196  std::vector<Unit*> possibleTargets;
1197  possibleTargets.reserve(m_UniqueTargetInfo.size());
1198  for (TargetList::const_iterator itr = m_UniqueTargetInfo.begin(); itr != m_UniqueTargetInfo.end(); ++itr)
1199  {
1200  // Skip Non-Players
1201  if (!itr->targetGUID.IsPlayer())
1202  continue;
1203 
1204  if (Unit* target = m_caster->GetMap()->GetPlayer(itr->targetGUID))
1205  possibleTargets.push_back(target);
1206  }
1207 
1208  // Cast Siphon Soul channeling spell
1209  if (!possibleTargets.empty())
1210  possibleTargets[urand(0, possibleTargets.size() - 1)]->CastSpell(m_caster, 23139, TRIGGERED_NONE);
1211 
1212  if (m_caster->AI())
1213  m_caster->AI()->SendAIEvent(AI_EVENT_CUSTOM_A, m_caster, m_caster);
1214 
1215  return;
1216  }
1217  case 23173: // Brood Affliction - TODO: Rework to use proper targeting
1218  {
1219  // This spell selects one brood affliction amongst five and apply it onto 15 targets
1220  // If there are less than 15 targets, then the spell loops over the targets again
1221  // until there are 15 appliance of the chosen brood affliction
1222 
1223  // Brood Affliction selection
1224  uint32 afflictions[] = { 23153, 23154, 23155, 23170, 23169 }; // Blue / Black / Red / Bronze / Green
1225  uint32 spellAfflict = afflictions[urand(0, 4)];
1226 
1227  // Get the fifteen (potentially duplicate) targets from threat list
1228  GuidVector vGuids;
1229  ((Creature*)m_caster)->FillGuidsListFromThreatList(vGuids);
1230 
1231  std::vector<Unit*> fifteenTargets;
1232  uint8 targetsCount = 0;
1233  while (targetsCount < 15)
1234  {
1235  for (GuidVector::const_iterator i = vGuids.begin(); i != vGuids.end(); ++i)
1236  {
1237  Unit* unit = m_caster->GetMap()->GetUnit(*i);
1238  if (unit && targetsCount < 15 && unit->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_PLAYER && unit->IsAlive())
1239  {
1240  fifteenTargets.push_back(unit);
1241  targetsCount++;
1242  }
1243  else break;
1244  }
1245  // Prevent infinite loop: if fifteenTargets is still empty after first iteration: return
1246  if (targetsCount == 0)
1247  {
1248  return;
1249  }
1250  }
1251 
1252  for (auto unit : fifteenTargets)
1253  {
1254  // Cast Brood Affliction if not mutated
1255  if (!(unit->HasAura(23174, EFFECT_INDEX_0)))
1256  m_caster->CastSpell(unit, spellAfflict, TRIGGERED_OLD_TRIGGERED);
1257 
1258  // Cast Chromatic Mutation (23174) if target is now affected by all five brood afflictions
1259  if (unit->HasAura(23153, EFFECT_INDEX_0)
1260  && unit->HasAura(23154, EFFECT_INDEX_0)
1261  && unit->HasAura(23155, EFFECT_INDEX_0)
1262  && unit->HasAura(23170, EFFECT_INDEX_0)
1263  && unit->HasAura(23169, EFFECT_INDEX_0))
1264  {
1265  unit->RemoveAllAuras();
1266  m_caster->CastSpell(unit, 23174, TRIGGERED_OLD_TRIGGERED);
1267  unit->CastSpell(unit, 23175, TRIGGERED_OLD_TRIGGERED);
1268  unit->CastSpell(unit, 23177, TRIGGERED_OLD_TRIGGERED);
1269  }
1270  }
1271  return;
1272  }
1273  case 23195: // Dragondog Breath Selection
1274  {
1275  // This spell selects two breaths for Chromaggus amongst five and send them to BWL instance script through events
1276 
1277  // Breaths selection
1278  // 5 possiblities for the first breath, 4 for the second: 20 total possiblites
1279  uint8 rightBreath = urand(0, 4);
1280  uint8 leftBreath = (rightBreath + urand(1, 4)) % 5;
1281 
1282  // Sending left breath to instance script
1283  uint32 leftBreaths[] = { 23317, 23318, 23319, 23320, 23321 };
1284  m_caster->CastSpell(m_caster, leftBreaths[leftBreath], TRIGGERED_OLD_TRIGGERED);
1285 
1286  // Sending right breath to instance script
1287  uint32 rightBreaths[] = { 23322, 23323, 23324, 23325, 23326 };
1288  m_caster->CastSpell(m_caster, rightBreaths[rightBreath], TRIGGERED_OLD_TRIGGERED);
1289 
1290  return;
1291  }
1292  case 23343: // Nefarian Tunnel Selection
1293  {
1294  // This spell selects two kinds of drakonids amongst five and send them to BWL instance script through events
1295 
1296  // Drakonids selection
1297  // 5 possiblities for the first kind, 4 for the second: 20 total possiblites
1298  uint8 rightDrakonid = urand(0, 4);
1299  uint8 leftDrakonid = (rightDrakonid + urand(1, 4)) % 5;
1300 
1301  // Sending left tunnel selection to instance script
1302  uint32 leftDrakonids[] = { 23344, 23345, 23346, 23347, 23348 };
1303  m_caster->CastSpell(m_caster, leftDrakonids[leftDrakonid], TRIGGERED_OLD_TRIGGERED);
1304 
1305  // Sending right tunnel selection to instance script
1306  uint32 rightDrakonids[] = { 23349, 23350, 23351, 23352, 23353 };
1307  m_caster->CastSpell(m_caster, rightDrakonids[rightDrakonid], TRIGGERED_OLD_TRIGGERED);
1308 
1309  return;
1310  }
1311  case 23450: // Transporter Arrival - (Gadgetzan + Everlook)
1312  {
1313  uint32 rand = urand(0, 5); // Roll for minor malfunctions:
1314  if (!rand) // (1/6) - Polymorph (23456 & 23457 are both carbon copies of this one)
1315  m_caster->CastSpell(m_caster, 23444, TRIGGERED_OLD_TRIGGERED);
1316  else if (rand <= 2) // (2/6) - Evil Twin
1317  m_caster->CastSpell(m_caster, 23445, TRIGGERED_OLD_TRIGGERED);
1318 
1319  return;
1320  }
1321  case 23453: // Gnomish Transporter - Ultrasafe Transporter: Gadgetzan
1322  {
1323  // Roll chance for major malfunction (1/6); 23441 = success | 23446 = malfunction (missed destination)
1324  m_caster->CastSpell(m_caster, (urand(0, 5) ? 23441 : 23446), TRIGGERED_OLD_TRIGGERED);
1325 
1326  return;
1327  }
1328  case 23645: // Hourglass Sand
1329  {
1330  m_caster->RemoveAurasDueToSpell(23170); // Brood Affliction: Bronze
1331 
1332  return;
1333  }
1334  case 23725: // Gift of Life (warrior bwl trinket)
1335  {
1336  m_caster->CastSpell(nullptr, 23782, TRIGGERED_OLD_TRIGGERED);
1337  // m_caster->CastSpell(nullptr, 23783, TRIGGERED_OLD_TRIGGERED); // Patch 2.1 no longer heals
1338  return;
1339  }
1340  case 23484: // Dispel Drakonids
1341  {
1342  // Despawn all drakonids from Nefarian phase 1
1343  if (unitTarget->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_UNIT)
1344  {
1345  switch (unitTarget->GetEntry())
1346  {
1347  case 14261:
1348  case 14262:
1349  case 14263:
1350  case 14264:
1351  case 14265:
1352  case 14302:
1353  ((Creature*)unitTarget)->ForcedDespawn();
1354  }
1355  }
1356  return;
1357  }
1358  case 24019: // Gurubashi Axe Thrower; Axe Flurry.
1359  {
1360  if (unitTarget && m_caster->IsWithinLOSInMap(unitTarget, true))
1361  m_caster->CastSpell(unitTarget, 24020, TRIGGERED_OLD_TRIGGERED);
1362 
1363  return;
1364  }
1365  case 24150: // Stinger Charge Primer
1366  {
1367  if (unitTarget->HasAura(25187))
1368  m_caster->CastSpell(unitTarget, 25191, TRIGGERED_OLD_TRIGGERED);
1369  else
1370  m_caster->CastSpell(unitTarget, 25190, TRIGGERED_OLD_TRIGGERED);
1371 
1372  return;
1373  }
1374  case 24796: // Summon Demented Druid Spirit
1375  {
1376  if (unitTarget && unitTarget->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_PLAYER)
1377  m_caster->CastSpell(unitTarget, 24795, TRIGGERED_OLD_TRIGGERED);
1378 
1379  return;
1380  }
1381  case 25145: // Merithra's Wake
1382  {
1383  unitTarget->CastSpell(unitTarget, 25172, TRIGGERED_OLD_TRIGGERED);
1384  return;
1385  }
1386  case 25149: // Arygos's Vengeance
1387  {
1388  unitTarget->CastSpell(unitTarget, 25168, TRIGGERED_OLD_TRIGGERED);
1389  return;
1390  }
1391  case 25150: // Molten Rain
1392  {
1393  unitTarget->CastSpell(unitTarget, 25169, TRIGGERED_OLD_TRIGGERED);
1394  unitTarget->CastSpell(unitTarget, 25170, TRIGGERED_OLD_TRIGGERED);
1395  return;
1396  }
1397  case 25158: // Time Stop
1398  {
1399  unitTarget->SetImmuneToNPC(true);
1400  unitTarget->RemoveAllAuras();
1401  unitTarget->CastSpell(unitTarget, 25171, TRIGGERED_OLD_TRIGGERED);
1402  return;
1403  }
1404  case 25792: // Despawn Brood
1405  {
1406  // Despawn all Yauj Brood
1407  if (unitTarget->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_UNIT && unitTarget->GetEntry() == 15621)
1408  ((Creature*)unitTarget)->ForcedDespawn();
1409  return;
1410  }
1411  case 26080: // Stinger Charge Primer
1412  {
1413  if (unitTarget->HasAura(26078))
1414  m_caster->CastSpell(unitTarget, 26082, TRIGGERED_OLD_TRIGGERED);
1415  else
1416  m_caster->CastSpell(unitTarget, 26081, TRIGGERED_OLD_TRIGGERED);
1417 
1418  return;
1419  }
1420  case 24721: // Buru Transform
1421  {
1422  // remaining Buru Eggs summon Hive'Zara Hatchlings and despawn
1423  if (unitTarget->GetEntry() == 15514)
1424  {
1425  unitTarget->CastSpell(unitTarget, 1881, TRIGGERED_OLD_TRIGGERED);
1426  ((Creature*)unitTarget)->ForcedDespawn();
1427  }
1428 
1429  return;
1430  }
1431  case 24781: // Dream Fog
1432  {
1433  // Let the current target be and move to the new one
1434  if (m_caster->GetVictim())
1435  {
1436  m_caster->DeleteThreatList();
1437  m_caster->AttackStop(true, false, false);
1438  }
1439  if (unitTarget && m_caster->AI())
1440  m_caster->AI()->AttackStart(unitTarget);
1441 
1442  return;
1443  }
1444  case 24886: // Despawn Taerar Shades
1445  {
1446  if (unitTarget && unitTarget->GetEntry() == 15302)
1447  {
1448  ((Creature*)unitTarget)->ForcedDespawn();
1449  ((Creature*)unitTarget)->RemoveFromWorld();
1450  }
1451 
1452  return;
1453  }
1454  case 24930: // Hallow's End Treat
1455  {
1456  // 24924 = Larger and Orange | 24925 = Skeleton | 24926 = Pirate | 24927 = Ghost
1457  const uint32 spell_list[4] = {24924, 24925, 24926, 24927};
1458  m_caster->CastSpell(m_caster, spell_list[urand(0, 3)], TRIGGERED_OLD_TRIGGERED);
1459 
1460  return;
1461  }
1462  case 25860: // Reindeer Transformation
1463  {
1464  if (!m_caster->HasAuraType(SPELL_AURA_MOUNTED))
1465  return;
1466 
1467  float flyspeed = m_caster->GetSpeedRate(MOVE_FLIGHT);
1468  float speed = m_caster->GetSpeedRate(MOVE_RUN);
1469 
1470  m_caster->RemoveSpellsCausingAura(SPELL_AURA_MOUNTED);
1471 
1472  // 5 different spells used depending on mounted speed and if mount can fly or not
1473  if (flyspeed >= 4.1f)
1474  // Flying Reindeer
1475  m_caster->CastSpell(m_caster, 44827, TRIGGERED_OLD_TRIGGERED); // 310% flying Reindeer
1476  else if (flyspeed >= 3.8f)
1477  // Flying Reindeer
1478  m_caster->CastSpell(m_caster, 44825, TRIGGERED_OLD_TRIGGERED); // 280% flying Reindeer
1479  else if (flyspeed >= 1.6f)
1480  // Flying Reindeer
1481  m_caster->CastSpell(m_caster, 44824, TRIGGERED_OLD_TRIGGERED); // 60% flying Reindeer
1482  else if (speed >= 2.0f)
1483  // Reindeer
1484  m_caster->CastSpell(m_caster, 25859, TRIGGERED_OLD_TRIGGERED); // 100% ground Reindeer
1485  else
1486  // Reindeer
1487  m_caster->CastSpell(m_caster, 25858, TRIGGERED_OLD_TRIGGERED); // 60% ground Reindeer
1488 
1489  return;
1490  }
1491  case 26074: // Holiday Cheer
1492  {
1493  // implemented at client side
1494  return;
1495  }
1496  case 26374: // Elune's Candle
1497  {
1498  if (unitTarget->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_UNIT && unitTarget->GetEntry() == 15467) // Omen
1499  {
1500  uint32 eluneCandle[5] = { 26622, 26623, 26624, 26625, 26649 };
1501  m_caster->CastSpell(unitTarget, eluneCandle[urand(0, 4)], TRIGGERED_OLD_TRIGGERED); // Damage (random visual)
1502  return;
1503  }
1504  // Default harmless spell
1505  m_caster->CastSpell(unitTarget, 26636, TRIGGERED_OLD_TRIGGERED);
1506 
1507  return;
1508  }
1509  case 26399: // Despawn Tentacles
1510  {
1511  if (unitTarget->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_UNIT)
1512  ((Creature*)unitTarget)->ForcedDespawn();
1513  return;
1514  }
1515  case 26626: // Mana Burn Area
1516  {
1517  if (unitTarget->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_UNIT && unitTarget->GetPowerType() == POWER_MANA)
1518  m_caster->CastSpell(unitTarget, 25779, TRIGGERED_OLD_TRIGGERED);
1519 
1520  return;
1521  }
1522  case 26899: // Give Friendship Bracers
1523  {
1524  if ((unitTarget && unitTarget->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_UNIT) || !unitTarget->HasAura(26898)) // Target is not a player or is not heartbroken
1525  return;
1526 
1527  unitTarget->RemoveAurasDueToSpell(26898); // Remove Heartbroken
1528  unitTarget->CastSpell(unitTarget, 26921, TRIGGERED_OLD_TRIGGERED); // cast Cancel Heartbroken, Create Bracelet
1529  return;
1530  }
1531  case 28000: // Land Mine Trigger
1532  {
1533  if (!unitTarget)
1534  return;
1535 
1536  m_caster->CastSpell(nullptr, 25099, TRIGGERED_OLD_TRIGGERED); // Detonation
1537  m_caster->RemoveAurasDueToSpell(27999); // Land Mine Periodic
1538  static_cast<Creature*>(m_caster)->ForcedDespawn(2000);
1539  return;
1540  }
1541  case 28098: // Stalagg Tesla Effect
1542  case 28110: // Feugen Tesla Effect
1543  {
1544  if (unitTarget && unitTarget->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_UNIT && unitTarget->IsAlive())
1545  {
1546  if (!m_caster->hasUnitState(UNIT_STAT_ROOT)) // This state is found in sniffs and is probably caused by another aura like 23973
1547  m_caster->addUnitState(UNIT_STAT_ROOT); // but as we are not sure (the aura does not show up in sniffs), we handle the state here
1548 
1549  // Cast chain (Stalagg Chain or Feugen Chain)
1550  uint32 chainSpellId = m_spellInfo->Id == 28098 ? 28096 : 28111;
1551  // Only cast if not already present and in range
1552  if (!unitTarget->HasAura(chainSpellId) && m_caster->IsWithinDistInMap(unitTarget, 60.0f))
1553  {
1554  if (!m_caster->IsImmuneToPlayer())
1555  m_caster->SetImmuneToPlayer(true);
1556  m_caster->CastSpell(unitTarget, chainSpellId, TRIGGERED_OLD_TRIGGERED);
1557  }
1558  // Not in range and fight in progress: remove aura and cast Shock onto players
1559  else if (!m_caster->IsWithinDistInMap(unitTarget, 60.0f) && m_caster)
1560  {
1561  unitTarget->RemoveAurasDueToSpell(chainSpellId);
1562  m_caster->SetImmuneToPlayer(false);
1563 
1564  if (Unit* target = ((Creature*)m_caster)->SelectAttackingTarget(ATTACKING_TARGET_RANDOM, 0))
1565  m_caster->CastSpell(target, 28099, TRIGGERED_NONE);
1566  }
1567  // else: in range and already have aura: do nothing
1568  }
1569  return;
1570  }
1571  case 28359: // Trigger Teslas
1572  {
1573  if (unitTarget)
1574  {
1575  DoScriptText(-1533150, unitTarget, unitTarget);
1576  unitTarget->RemoveAllAuras();
1577  unitTarget->CastSpell(unitTarget, 28159, TRIGGERED_NONE); // Shock
1578  }
1579  return;
1580  }
1581  case 28414: // Call of the Ashbringer
1582  {
1583  if (!m_caster || m_caster->GetTypeId() != TYPEID_PLAYER)
1584  return;
1585  static constexpr uint32 AshbringerSounds[12] = { 8906,8907,8908,8920,8921,8922,8923,8924,8925,8926,8927,8928 };
1586  m_caster->PlayDirectSound(AshbringerSounds[urand(0, 11)], PlayPacketParameters(PLAY_TARGET, (Player*)m_caster));
1587  return;
1588  }
1589  case 28697: // Forgiveness
1590  {
1591  unitTarget->CastSpell(nullptr, 29266, TRIGGERED_OLD_TRIGGERED); // guessed permanent feign death spell
1592  return;
1593  }
1594  case 28730: // Arcane Torrent (Mana)
1595  {
1596  Aura* dummy = m_caster->GetDummyAura(28734);
1597  if (dummy)
1598  {
1599  int32 bp = damage * dummy->GetStackAmount();
1600  m_caster->CastCustomSpell(m_caster, 28733, &bp, nullptr, nullptr, TRIGGERED_OLD_TRIGGERED);
1601  m_caster->RemoveAurasDueToSpell(28734);
1602  }
1603 
1604  return;
1605  }
1606  case 28961: // Summon Corpse Scarabs (10)
1607  {
1608  if (unitTarget->IsAlive())
1609  return;
1610 
1611  unitTarget->CastSpell(unitTarget, 28864, TRIGGERED_OLD_TRIGGERED); // Actual summoning spell
1612  ((Creature*)unitTarget)->ForcedDespawn(2000);
1613 
1614  return;
1615  }

1617  {
1618  if (m_caster->GetTypeId() != TYPEID_PLAYER)
1619  return;
1620 
1621  uint32 spell_id = roll_chance_i(50)
1622  ? 29277 // Summon Purified Helboar Meat
1623  : 29278; // Summon Toxic Helboar Meat
1624

1626  return;
1627  }

1629  {
1630  m_caster->CastCustomSpell(m_caster, 29766, &damage, nullptr, nullptr, TRIGGERED_OLD_TRIGGERED, nullptr);
1631  return;
1632  }
1633  case 29858: // Soulshatter
1634  {
1635  if (unitTarget && unitTarget->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_UNIT && unitTarget->CanAttack(m_caster))
1636  m_caster->CastSpell(unitTarget, 32835, TRIGGERED_OLD_TRIGGERED);
1637 
1638  return;
1639  }
1640  case 30023: // Periodic Trigger Dummy - triggered by many spells
1641  {
1642  switch (m_triggeredByAuraSpell->Id)
1643  {
1644  case 29946: break; // Flame Wreath
1645  case 29947: // Flame Wreath
1646  {
1647  // Cast explosion debuff
1648  unitTarget->CastSpell(unitTarget, 29949, TRIGGERED_NONE);
1649  return;
1650  }
1651  case 37589: // Shriveling gaze
1652  {
1653  unitTarget->RemoveAuraStack(m_triggeredByAuraSpell->Id);
1654  return;
1655  }
1656  case 40250: // Improved Duration - Anzu spirits
1657  {
1658  auto periodicAuraList = unitTarget->GetAurasByType(SPELL_AURA_PERIODIC_HEAL);
1659  uint32 duration = 0;
1660  for (auto itr = periodicAuraList.rbegin(); itr != periodicAuraList.rend(); ++itr)
1661  {
1662  if ((*itr)->GetHolder()->GetSpellProto()->IsFitToFamily(SPELLFAMILY_DRUID, 0x0000001000000050)) // only Rejuvenation, Regrowth and Lifebloom
1663  {
1664  Aura* lastPeriodic = *itr; // get last applied druid HOT
1665  duration = lastPeriodic->GetHolder()->GetAuraDuration();
1666  duration = duration * 2 > 60000 ? 60000 : duration * 2;
1667  lastPeriodic->GetHolder()->SetAuraDuration(duration); // double duration up to 60 seconds
1668  lastPeriodic->GetHolder()->SetAuraMaxDuration(duration);
1669  lastPeriodic->GetHolder()->UpdateAuraDuration();
1670  }
1671  }
1672  unitTarget->AI()->SendAIEvent(AI_EVENT_CUSTOM_A, unitTarget, unitTarget, duration);
1673  return;
1674  }
1675  default:
1676  break;
1677  }
1678  return;
1679  }
1680  case 30458: // Nigh Invulnerability
1681  {
1682  if (!m_CastItem)
1683  return;
1684 
1685  if (roll_chance_i(86)) // Nigh-Invulnerability - success
1686  m_caster->CastSpell(m_caster, 30456, TRIGGERED_OLD_TRIGGERED, m_CastItem);
1687  else // Complete Vulnerability - backfire in 14% casts
1688  m_caster->CastSpell(m_caster, 30457, TRIGGERED_OLD_TRIGGERED, m_CastItem);
1689 
1690  return;
1691  }
1692  case 30507: // Poultryizer
1693  {
1694  if (!m_CastItem)
1695  return;
1696 
1697  if (roll_chance_i(80)) // Poultryized! - success
1698  m_caster->CastSpell(unitTarget, 30501, TRIGGERED_OLD_TRIGGERED, m_CastItem);
1699  else // Poultryized! - backfire 20%
1700  m_caster->CastSpell(unitTarget, 30504, TRIGGERED_OLD_TRIGGERED, m_CastItem);
1701 
1702  return;
1703  }

1792  case 34094: // Power of Arrazius
1793  {
1794  if (!unitTarget)
1795  return;
1796 
1797  uint32 triggered_spell_id = 0;
1798  AIEventType triggered_event = AI_EVENT_CUSTOM_A;
1799 
1800  // Feeble Weapons: Warrior, Rogue, Hunter
1801  // Doubting Mind: Paladin, Shaman, Druid
1802  // Chilling Words: Mage, Warlock, Priest
1803  switch (unitTarget->getClass())
1804  {
1805  case CLASS_WARRIOR:
1806  case CLASS_ROGUE:
1807  case CLASS_HUNTER:
1808  triggered_spell_id = 34088;
1809  triggered_event = AI_EVENT_CUSTOM_EVENTAI_A;
1810  break;
1811  case CLASS_PALADIN:
1812  case CLASS_SHAMAN:
1813  case CLASS_DRUID:
1814  triggered_spell_id = 34089;
1815  triggered_event = AI_EVENT_CUSTOM_EVENTAI_B;
1816  break;
1817  case CLASS_MAGE:
1818  case CLASS_WARLOCK:
1819  case CLASS_PRIEST:
1820  triggered_spell_id = 34087;
1821  triggered_event = AI_EVENT_CUSTOM_EVENTAI_C;
1822  break;
1823  default:
1824  return;
1825  }
1826 
1827  // This spell has lower range than the main spell,
1828  // and the spell might fail because of that; this is working as
1829  // intended
1830  m_caster->CastSpell(unitTarget, triggered_spell_id, TRIGGERED_OLD_TRIGGERED);
1831  if (m_caster->IsCreature())
1832  m_caster->AI()->SendAIEvent(triggered_event, unitTarget, m_caster);
1833 
1834  return;
1835  }

1880  return;
1881 
1882  uint32 possibleSpells[] = {36693, 36694, 36695, 36696, 36697, 36698, 36699, 36700} ;
1883  std::vector<uint32> spellPool(possibleSpells, possibleSpells + countof(possibleSpells));
1884  std::shuffle(spellPool.begin(), spellPool.end(), *GetRandomGenerator());
1885 
1886  for (uint8 i = 0; i < (m_caster->GetMap()->IsRegularDifficulty() ? 2 : 4); ++i)
1887  m_caster->CastSpell(m_caster, spellPool[i], TRIGGERED_OLD_TRIGGERED);
1888 
1889  return;

1979  {
1980  if (unitTarget->GetObjectGuid().GetEntry() == 22160)
1981  {
1982  bool checkTaskmaster = false;
1983  bool checkSoothsayer = false;
1984  for (auto& target : m_UniqueTargetInfo)
1985  {
1986  if (target.targetGUID.GetEntry() == 22160)
1987  checkTaskmaster = true;
1988  else if (target.targetGUID.GetEntry() == 22384)
1989  checkSoothsayer = true;
1990  }
1991  if (checkSoothsayer && checkTaskmaster)
1992  m_caster->CastSpell(nullptr, 39074, TRIGGERED_OLD_TRIGGERED);
1993  }
1994  }
1995  return;
1996  }

2000  return;

2004 
2005  // 39088 39091
2006  switch (m_scriptValue)
2007  {
2008  case 0: // first target random
2009  m_scriptValue = urand(0, 1) ? 39088 : 39091;
2010  unitTarget->CastSpell(unitTarget, m_scriptValue, TRIGGERED_OLD_TRIGGERED);
2011  break;
2012  case 39088: // second target the other
2013  m_scriptValue = 1;
2014  unitTarget->CastSpell(unitTarget, 39091, TRIGGERED_OLD_TRIGGERED);
2015  break;
2016  case 39091:
2017  m_scriptValue = 1;
2018  unitTarget->CastSpell(unitTarget, 39088, TRIGGERED_OLD_TRIGGERED);
2019  break;
2020  default: // third and later random
2021  unitTarget->CastSpell(unitTarget, urand(0, 1) ? 39088 : 39091, TRIGGERED_OLD_TRIGGERED);
2022  break;
2023  }

2172  }

2195  return;
2196  }
2197  case 40802: // Mingo's Fortune Generator (Mingo's Fortune Giblets)
2198  {
2199  // selecting one from Bloodstained Fortune item
2200  uint32 newitemid;
2201  switch (urand(1, 20))
2202  {
2203  case 1: newitemid = 32688; break;
2204  case 2: newitemid = 32689; break;
2205  case 3: newitemid = 32690; break;
2206  case 4: newitemid = 32691; break;
2207  case 5: newitemid = 32692; break;
2208  case 6: newitemid = 32693; break;
2209  case 7: newitemid = 32700; break;
2210  case 8: newitemid = 32701; break;
2211  case 9: newitemid = 32702; break;
2212  case 10: newitemid = 32703; break;
2213  case 11: newitemid = 32704; break;
2214  case 12: newitemid = 32705; break;
2215  case 13: newitemid = 32706; break;
2216  case 14: newitemid = 32707; break;
2217  case 15: newitemid = 32708; break;
2218  case 16: newitemid = 32709; break;
2219  case 17: newitemid = 32710; break;
2220  case 18: newitemid = 32711; break;
2221  case 19: newitemid = 32712; break;
2222  case 20: newitemid = 32713; break;
2223  default:
2224  return;
2225  }
2226 
2227  DoCreateItem(eff_idx, newitemid);
2228  return;
2229  }
2230  case 40834: // Agonizing Flames
2231  {
2232  if (!unitTarget || unitTarget->GetTypeId() != TYPEID_PLAYER)
2233  return;
2234 
2235  m_caster->CastSpell(unitTarget, 40932, TRIGGERED_OLD_TRIGGERED);
2236  return;
2237  }
2238  case 40869: // Fatal Attraction - Mother Shahraz
2239  {
2240  if (!unitTarget || unitTarget->GetTypeId() != TYPEID_PLAYER)
2241  return;
2242 
2243  m_caster->CastSpell(unitTarget, 41001, TRIGGERED_OLD_TRIGGERED);
2244  return;
2245  }
2246  case 40870: // Fatal Attraction - tick - Mother Shahraz
2247  {
2248  if (!unitTarget || m_scriptValue != 0) // only execute once
2249  return;
2250  m_scriptValue = 1;
2251  Aura* aura = m_caster->GetAura(41001, EFFECT_INDEX_1);
2252  if (!aura)
2253  return;
2254  int32 dmgValue = std::min(aura->GetAuraTicks(), 4u) * 750;
2255  m_caster->CastCustomSpell(nullptr, 40871, &dmgValue, nullptr, nullptr, TRIGGERED_OLD_TRIGGERED);
2256  return;
2257  }
2258  case 40962: // Blade's Edge Terrace Demon Boss Summon Branch
2259  {
2260  if (!unitTarget || unitTarget->GetTypeId() != TYPEID_PLAYER)
2261  return;
2262 
2263  uint32 spell_id = 0;
2264  switch (urand(1, 4))
2265  {
2266  case 1: spell_id = 40957; break; // Blade's Edge Terrace Demon Boss Summon 1
2267  case 2: spell_id = 40959; break; // Blade's Edge Terrace Demon Boss Summon 2
2268  case 3: spell_id = 40960; break; // Blade's Edge Terrace Demon Boss Summon 3
2269  case 4: spell_id = 40961; break; // Blade's Edge Terrace Demon Boss Summon 4
2270  }
2271  unitTarget->CastSpell(unitTarget, spell_id, TRIGGERED_OLD_TRIGGERED);
2272  return;
2273  }
2274  case 41283: // Abyssal Toss
2275  {
2276  if (!unitTarget)
2277  return;
2278 
2279  unitTarget->CastSpell(nullptr, 41284, TRIGGERED_OLD_TRIGGERED);
2280  return;
2281  }
2282  case 41333: // Empyreal Equivalency
2283  {
2284  if (!unitTarget)
2285  return;
2286 
2287  // Equilize the health of all targets based on the corresponding health percent
2288  unitTarget->SetHealth(m_caster->GetHealth() / 4);
2289  return;
2290  }
2291  case 41499: // Empyreal Balance
2292  {
2293  unitTarget->SetMaxHealth(m_caster->GetMaxHealth() / 4);
2294  return;
2295  }
2296  case 42287: // Salvage Wreckage
2297  {
2298  if (m_caster->GetTypeId() != TYPEID_PLAYER)
2299  return;
2300 
2301  if (roll_chance_i(66))
2302  m_caster->CastSpell(m_caster, 42289, TRIGGERED_OLD_TRIGGERED, m_CastItem);
2303  else
2304  m_caster->CastSpell(m_caster, 42288, TRIGGERED_OLD_TRIGGERED);
2305 
2306  return;
2307  }
2308  case 42489: // Cast Ooze Zap When Energized
2309  {
2310  if (!unitTarget || !m_caster->HasAura(42490))
2311  return;
2312 
2313  m_caster->CastSpell(unitTarget, 42483, TRIGGERED_NONE);
2314 
2315  return;
2316  }
2317  case 42628: // Fire Bomb (throw)
2318  {
2319  if (!unitTarget)
2320  return;
2321 
2322  unitTarget->CastSpell(nullptr, 42629, TRIGGERED_OLD_TRIGGERED);
2323  return;
2324  }
2325  case 42631: // Fire Bomb (explode)
2326  {
2327  if (!unitTarget || unitTarget->GetTypeId() != TYPEID_UNIT)
2328  return;
2329 
2330  unitTarget->RemoveAurasDueToSpell(42629);
2331  unitTarget->CastSpell(unitTarget, 42630, TRIGGERED_OLD_TRIGGERED);
2332 
2333  // despawn the bomb after exploding
2334  ((Creature*)unitTarget)->ForcedDespawn(3000);
2335  return;
2336  }
2337  case 43096: // Summon All Players
2338  {
2339  if (!unitTarget || unitTarget->GetTypeId() != TYPEID_PLAYER)
2340  return;
2341 
2342  m_caster->CastSpell(unitTarget, 43097, TRIGGERED_OLD_TRIGGERED);
2343  return;
2344  }
2345  case 43144: // Hatch All Eggs
2346  {
2347  if (!unitTarget)
2348  return;
2349 
2350  unitTarget->CastSpell(nullptr, 42493, TRIGGERED_OLD_TRIGGERED, nullptr, nullptr, m_caster->GetObjectGuid());
2351  return;
2352  }
2353  case 43152: // Lynx Rush - Zul'Jin
2354  {
2355  if (!unitTarget || m_scriptValue)
2356  return;
2357 
2358  m_scriptValue = 1;
2359  GuidVector targets;
2360  for (TargetList::const_iterator ihit = m_UniqueTargetInfo.begin(); ihit != m_UniqueTargetInfo.end(); ++ ihit)
2361  if (ihit->effectMask & (1 << eff_idx) && ihit->missCondition == SPELL_MISS_NONE)
2362  targets.push_back(ihit->targetGUID);
2363 
2364  ObjectGuid guid = targets[urand(0, targets.size() - 1)];
2365  if (Unit* target = m_caster->GetMap()->GetUnit(guid))
2366  m_caster->CastSpell(target, 43153, TRIGGERED_NONE);
2367  return;
2368  }
2369  case 43498: // Siphon Soul
2370  {
2371  // This spell should cast the next spell only for one (player)target, however it should hit multiple targets, hence this kind of implementation
2372  if (!unitTarget || m_UniqueTargetInfo.rbegin()->targetGUID != unitTarget->GetObjectGuid())
2373  return;
2374 
2375  std::vector<Unit*> possibleTargets;
2376  possibleTargets.reserve(m_UniqueTargetInfo.size());
2377  for (TargetList::const_iterator itr = m_UniqueTargetInfo.begin(); itr != m_UniqueTargetInfo.end(); ++itr)
2378  {
2379  // Skip Non-Players
2380  if (!itr->targetGUID.IsPlayer())
2381  continue;
2382 
2383  if (Unit* target = m_caster->GetMap()->GetPlayer(itr->targetGUID))
2384  possibleTargets.push_back(target);
2385  }
2386 
2387  // Cast Siphon Soul channeling spell
2388  if (!possibleTargets.empty())
2389  m_caster->CastSpell(possibleTargets[urand(0, possibleTargets.size() - 1)], 43501, TRIGGERED_NONE);
2390 
2391  return;
2392  }
2393  case 43647: // Cosmetic - Spear Throw
2394  {
2395  if (!unitTarget || unitTarget->GetTypeId() != TYPEID_UNIT)
2396  return;
2397 
2398  unitTarget->SetFlag(UNIT_FIELD_FLAGS, 33587456);
2399  unitTarget->SetDisplayId(22347);
2400  unitTarget->CastSpell(unitTarget, 23973, TRIGGERED_OLD_TRIGGERED);
2401  unitTarget->SetStandState(UNIT_STAND_STATE_DEAD);
2402  return;
2403  }
2404  case 44875: // Complete Raptor Capture
2405  {
2406  if (!unitTarget || unitTarget->GetTypeId() != TYPEID_UNIT)
2407  return;
2408 
2409  Creature* creatureTarget = (Creature*)unitTarget;
2410 
2411  creatureTarget->ForcedDespawn();
2412 
2413  // cast spell Raptor Capture Credit
2414  m_caster->CastSpell(m_caster, 42337, TRIGGERED_OLD_TRIGGERED, nullptr);
2415  return;
2416  }
2417  case 44997: // Converting Sentry
2418  {
2419  if (!unitTarget || unitTarget->GetTypeId() != TYPEID_UNIT)
2420  return;
2421 
2422  Creature* creatureTarget = (Creature*)unitTarget;
2423 
2424  creatureTarget->ForcedDespawn();
2425 
2426  // Converted Sentry Credit
2427  m_caster->CastSpell(m_caster, 45009, TRIGGERED_OLD_TRIGGERED);
2428  return;
2429  }
2430  case 45030: // Impale Emissary
2431  {
2432  // Emissary of Hate Credit
2433  m_caster->CastSpell(m_caster, 45088, TRIGGERED_OLD_TRIGGERED);
2434  return;
2435  }
2436  case 45115: // Quest - Sunwell Daily - Ship Bombing Run Bomb
2437  {
2438  if (!unitTarget || unitTarget->GetTypeId() != TYPEID_UNIT || m_caster->GetTypeId() != TYPEID_PLAYER)
2439  return;
2440 
2441  GameObject* go = GetClosestGameObjectWithEntry(unitTarget, 182071, 10.0f);
2442  if (go)
2443  {
2444  go->SetLootState(GO_READY);
2445  go->SetRespawnTime(5);
2446  go->Refresh();
2447  }
2448  static_cast<Creature*>(unitTarget)->ForcedDespawn();
2449  return;
2450  }
2451  case 45260: // Karazhan - Chess - Force Player to Kill Bunny
2452  {
2453  if (!unitTarget || unitTarget->GetTypeId() != TYPEID_PLAYER)
2454  return;
2455 
2456  unitTarget->CastSpell(unitTarget, 45259, TRIGGERED_OLD_TRIGGERED);
2457  return;
2458  }
2459  case 46292: // Cataclysm Breath
2460  {
2461  if (!unitTarget || unitTarget->GetTypeId() != TYPEID_PLAYER)
2462  return;
2463 
2464  uint32 possibleSpells[] = { 46293, 46294, 46295, 46296, 46297, 46298, 46299, 46300 };
2465  std::vector<uint32> spellPool(possibleSpells, possibleSpells + countof(possibleSpells));
2466  std::shuffle(spellPool.begin(), spellPool.end(), *GetRandomGenerator());
2467 
2468  for (uint8 i = 0; i < 4; ++i)
2469  m_caster->CastSpell(unitTarget, spellPool[i], TRIGGERED_OLD_TRIGGERED);
2470 
2471  return;
2472  }
2473  case 46372: // Ice Spear Target Picker
2474  {
2475  if (!unitTarget || unitTarget->GetTypeId() != TYPEID_PLAYER)
2476  return;
2477 
2478  m_caster->CastSpell(unitTarget, 46359, TRIGGERED_OLD_TRIGGERED);
2479  return;
2480  }
2481  case 46430: // Synch Health
2482  {
2483  if (!unitTarget)
2484  return;
2485 
2486  unitTarget->SetHealth(m_caster->GetHealth());
2487  return;
2488  }
2489  case 50243: // Teach Language
2490  {
2491  if (m_caster->GetTypeId() != TYPEID_PLAYER)
2492  return;
2493 
2494  // spell has a 1/3 chance to trigger one of the below
2495  if (roll_chance_i(66))
2496  return;
2497 
2498  if (((Player*)m_caster)->GetTeam() == ALLIANCE)
2499  {
2500  // 1000001 - gnomish binary
2501  m_caster->CastSpell(m_caster, 50242, TRIGGERED_OLD_TRIGGERED);
2502  }
2503  else
2504  {
2505  // 01001000 - goblin binary
2506  m_caster->CastSpell(m_caster, 50246, TRIGGERED_OLD_TRIGGERED);
2507  }
2508 
2509  return;
2510  }
2511  case 51582: // Rocket Boots Engaged (Rocket Boots Xtreme and Rocket Boots Xtreme Lite)
2512  {
2513  if (m_caster->GetTypeId() != TYPEID_PLAYER)
2514  return;
2515 
2516  if (BattleGround* bg = ((Player*)m_caster)->GetBattleGround())
2517  bg->HandlePlayerDroppedFlag((Player*)m_caster);
2518 
2519  m_caster->CastSpell(m_caster, 30452, TRIGGERED_OLD_TRIGGERED, nullptr);
2520  return;
2521  }
2522  }
2523 
2524  // All IconID Check in there
2525  switch (m_spellInfo->SpellIconID)
2526  {
2527  // Berserking (troll racial traits)
2528  case 1661:
2529  {
2530  uint32 healthPerc = uint32((float(m_caster->GetHealth()) / m_caster->GetMaxHealth()) * 100);
2531  int32 haste_mod = 10;
2532  if (healthPerc <= 40)
2533  haste_mod = 30;
2534  if (healthPerc < 100 && healthPerc > 40)
2535  haste_mod = 10 + (100 - healthPerc) / 3;
2536 
2537  // haste_mod is the same for all effects
2538  int32 hasteModBasePoints0 = haste_mod; // Haste Melee
2539  int32 hasteModBasePoints1 = haste_mod; // Haste Range
2540  int32 hasteModBasePoints2 = haste_mod; // Haste Cast
2541 
2542  // FIXME: custom spell required this aura state by some unknown reason, we not need remove it anyway
2543  m_caster->ModifyAuraState(AURA_STATE_BERSERKING, true);
2544  m_caster->CastCustomSpell(m_caster, 26635, &hasteModBasePoints0, &hasteModBasePoints1, &hasteModBasePoints2, TRIGGERED_OLD_TRIGGERED, nullptr);
2545  return;
2546  }
2547  }
2548  break;
2549  }
2550  case SPELLFAMILY_MAGE:
2551  {
2552  switch (m_spellInfo->Id)
2553  {
2554  case 11958: // Cold Snap
2555  {
2556  if (m_caster->GetTypeId() != TYPEID_PLAYER)
2557  return;
2558 
2559  // immediately finishes the cooldown on Frost spells
2560  auto cdCheck = [](SpellEntry const & spellEntry) -> bool
2561  {
2562  if (spellEntry.Id == 11958 || spellEntry.SpellFamilyName != SPELLFAMILY_MAGE)
2563  return false;
2564  if ((GetSpellSchoolMask(&spellEntry) & SPELL_SCHOOL_MASK_FROST) && GetSpellRecoveryTime(&spellEntry) > 0)
2565  return true;
2566  return false;
2567  };
2568  static_cast<Player*>(m_caster)->RemoveSomeCooldown(cdCheck);
2569  return;
2570  }
2571  case 38194: // Blink
2572  {
2573  // Blink
2574  if (unitTarget)
2575  unitTarget->CastSpell(m_caster, 38203, TRIGGERED_OLD_TRIGGERED);
2576 
2577  return;
2578  }
2579  case 38642: // Blink
2580  {
2581  // Blink
2582  if (unitTarget)
2583  unitTarget->CastSpell(m_caster, 38643, TRIGGERED_OLD_TRIGGERED);
2584  return;
2585  }
2586  case 41060: // Return
2587  {
2588  if (!unitTarget || m_caster->GetTypeId() != TYPEID_UNIT)
2589  return;
2590 
2591  ((Creature*)m_caster)->ForcedDespawn(2500);
2592  return;
2593  }
2594  }
2595  break;
2596  }
2597  case SPELLFAMILY_WARRIOR:
2598  {
2599  // Charge
2600  if ((m_spellInfo->SpellFamilyFlags & uint64(0x1)) && m_spellInfo->SpellVisual == 867)
2601  {
2602  int32 chargeBasePoints0 = damage;
2603  m_caster->CastCustomSpell(m_caster, 34846, &chargeBasePoints0, nullptr, nullptr, TRIGGERED_OLD_TRIGGERED);
2604  return;
2605  }
2606 
2607  switch (m_spellInfo->Id)
2608  {
2609  // Warrior's Wrath
2610  case 21977:

2613  return;
2614  m_caster->CastSpell(unitTarget, 21887, TRIGGERED_OLD_TRIGGERED); // spell mod
2615  return;
2616  }

2618  {
2619  if (!unitTarget)
2620  return;

2623  }

2625  {
2626  if (!unitTarget || eff_idx != EFFECT_INDEX_0)
2627  return;
2628

2630  return;
2631  }
2632  case 37144: // Move (Chess event player knight move)
2633  case 37146: // Move (Chess event player pawn move)
2634  case 37148: // Move (Chess event player queen move)
2635  case 37151: // Move (Chess event player rook move)
2636  case 37152: // Move (Chess event player bishop move)
2637  case 37153: // Move (Chess event player king move)
2638  {
2639  if (!unitTarget || unitTarget->GetTypeId() != TYPEID_UNIT)
2640  return;
2641

2643  m_caster->CastSpell(unitTarget, 30012, TRIGGERED_OLD_TRIGGERED);
2644  return;
2645  }
2646  }
2647  break;
2648  }
2649  case SPELLFAMILY_WARLOCK:
2650  {

2653  case 39977: // Remove Impaling Spine

2659  unitTarget->RemoveAurasDueToSpell(39837);
2660  return;

2663  break;
2664  }
2665  case SPELLFAMILY_PRIEST:
2666  {
2667  switch (m_spellInfo->Id)
2668  {
2669  case 28598: // Touch of Weakness triggered spell
2670  {
2671  if (!unitTarget || !m_triggeredByAuraSpell)
2672  return;
2673 
2674  uint32 spellid = 0;
2675 
2676  switch (m_triggeredByAuraSpell->Id)
2677  {
2678  case 2652: spellid = 2943; break; // Rank 1
2679  case 19261: spellid = 19249; break; // Rank 2
2680  case 19262: spellid = 19251; break; // Rank 3
2681  case 19264: spellid = 19252; break; // Rank 4
2682  case 19265: spellid = 19253; break; // Rank 5
2683  case 19266: spellid = 19254; break; // Rank 6
2684  case 25461: spellid = 25460; break; // Rank 7
2685  default:
2686  sLog.outError("Spell::EffectDummy: Spell 28598 triggered by unhandeled spell %u", m_triggeredByAuraSpell->Id);
2687  return;
2688  }
2689  m_caster->CastSpell(unitTarget, spellid, TRIGGERED_OLD_TRIGGERED, nullptr);
2690  return;
2691  }
2692  case 36448: // Focused Bursts
2693  case 36475:
2694  case 38986:
2695  case 38987:
2696  {
2697  if (!unitTarget || eff_idx != EFFECT_INDEX_0)
2698  return;
2699 
2700  uint32 spellid = m_spellInfo->EffectBasePoints[urand(0, MAX_EFFECT_INDEX - 1)] + 1;
2701  m_caster->CastSpell(unitTarget, spellid, TRIGGERED_OLD_TRIGGERED, nullptr);
2702  return;
2703  }
2704  }
2705 
2706  break;
2707  }
2708  case SPELLFAMILY_DRUID:
2709  {
2710  switch (m_spellInfo->Id)
2711  {
2712  case 5229: // Enrage
2713  {
2714  int32 reductionMod = -27;
2715  if (m_caster->HasAura(9634)) // If in Dire Bear form only 16%
2716  reductionMod = -16;
2717  m_caster->CastCustomSpell(nullptr, 25503, &reductionMod, nullptr, nullptr, TRIGGERED_OLD_TRIGGERED);
2718  return;
2719  }
2720  case 5420: // Tree of Life passive
2721  {
2722  // Tree of Life area effect
2723  int32 health_mod = int32(m_caster->GetStat(STAT_SPIRIT) / 4);
2724  if (Aura* aura = m_caster->GetAura(39926, EFFECT_INDEX_0)) // Improved party auras
2725  health_mod += aura->GetAmount();
2726  m_caster->CastCustomSpell(m_caster, 34123, &health_mod, nullptr, nullptr, TRIGGERED_OLD_TRIGGERED, nullptr);
2727  return;
2728  }
2729  case 29284: // Brittle Armor - dummy exists so that max stacks are added
2730  {
2731  m_caster->CastSpell(unitTarget, 24575, TRIGGERED_OLD_TRIGGERED);
2732  return;
2733  }
2734  case 29286: // Mercurial Shield - dummy exists so that max stacks are added
2735  {
2736  m_caster->CastSpell(unitTarget, 26464, TRIGGERED_OLD_TRIGGERED);
2737  return;
2738  }
2739  }
2740 
2741  break;
2742  }
2743  case SPELLFAMILY_ROGUE:
2744  {
2745  switch (m_spellInfo->Id)
2746  {
2747  case 5938: // Shiv
2748  {
2749  if (m_caster->GetTypeId() != TYPEID_PLAYER)
2750  return;
2751 
2752  Player* pCaster = static_cast<Player*>(m_caster);
2753 
2754  Item* item = pCaster->GetWeaponForAttack(OFF_ATTACK);
2755  if (!item)
2756  return;
2757 
2758  // all poison enchantments is temporary
2759  if (uint32 enchant_id = item->GetEnchantmentId(TEMP_ENCHANTMENT_SLOT))
2760  {
2761  SpellItemEnchantmentEntry const* pEnchant = sSpellItemEnchantmentStore.LookupEntry(enchant_id);
2762  if (!pEnchant)
2763  return;
2764 
2765  for (int s = 0; s < 3; ++s)
2766  {
2767  if (pEnchant->type[s] != ITEM_ENCHANTMENT_TYPE_COMBAT_SPELL)
2768  continue;
2769 
2770  SpellEntry const* combatEntry = sSpellTemplate.LookupEntry<SpellEntry>(pEnchant->spellid[s]);
2771  if (!combatEntry || combatEntry->Dispel != DISPEL_POISON)
2772  continue;
2773 
2774  m_caster->CastSpell(unitTarget, combatEntry, TRIGGERED_OLD_TRIGGERED, item);
2775  }
2776  }
2777 
2778  m_caster->CastSpell(unitTarget, 5940, TRIGGERED_OLD_TRIGGERED);
2779  return;
2780  }
2781 
2782  case 31231: // Cheat Death
2783  {
2784  // Cheating Death
2785  m_caster->CastSpell(m_caster, 45182, TRIGGERED_OLD_TRIGGERED);
2786  return;
2787  }
2788  }
2789  break;
2790  }
2791  case SPELLFAMILY_HUNTER:
2792  {
2793  switch (m_spellInfo->Id)
2794  {
2795  case 23989: // Readiness talent
2796  {
2797  if (m_caster->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_PLAYER)
2798  {
2799  // immediately finishes the cooldown for hunter abilities
2800  auto cdCheck = [](SpellEntry const & spellEntry) -> bool { return (spellEntry.SpellFamilyName == SPELLFAMILY_HUNTER && spellEntry.Id != 23989 && GetSpellRecoveryTime(&spellEntry) > 0); };
2801  static_cast<Player*>(m_caster)->RemoveSomeCooldown(cdCheck);
2802  }
2803  return;
2804  }
2805  }
2806 
2807  break;
2808  }
2809  case SPELLFAMILY_PALADIN:
2810  {
2811  switch (m_spellInfo->SpellIconID)
2812  {
2813  case 156: // Holy Shock
2814  {
2815  if (!unitTarget)
2816  return;
2817 
2818  int hurt;
2819  int heal;
2820  switch (m_spellInfo->Id)
2821  {
2822  case 20473: hurt = 25912; heal = 25914; break;
2823  case 20929: hurt = 25911; heal = 25913; break;
2824  case 20930: hurt = 25902; heal = 25903; break;
2825  case 27174: hurt = 27176; heal = 27175; break;
2826  case 33072: hurt = 33073; heal = 33074; break;
2827  default:
2828  sLog.outError("Spell::EffectDummy: Spell %u not handled in HS", m_spellInfo->Id);
2829  return;
2830  }
2831 
2832  if (m_caster->CanAssistSpell(unitTarget, m_spellInfo))
2833  m_caster->CastSpell(unitTarget, heal, TRIGGERED_OLD_TRIGGERED);
2834  else
2835  m_caster->CastSpell(unitTarget, hurt, TRIGGERED_OLD_TRIGGERED);
2836 
2837  return;
2838  }
2839  case 561: // Judgement of command
2840  {
2841  if (unitTarget)
2842  if (SpellEntry const* spell_proto = sSpellTemplate.LookupEntry<SpellEntry>(m_currentBasePoints[eff_idx]))
2843  m_caster->CastSpell(unitTarget, spell_proto, TRIGGERED_OLD_TRIGGERED, nullptr);
2844 
2845  return;
2846  }
2847  }
2848  switch (m_spellInfo->Id)
2849  {
2850  case 37877: // Blessing of Faith
2851  {
2852  if (!unitTarget)
2853  return;
2854 
2855  uint32 spell_id;
2856  switch (unitTarget->getClass())
2857  {
2858  case CLASS_DRUID: spell_id = 37878; break;
2859  case CLASS_PALADIN: spell_id = 37879; break;
2860  case CLASS_PRIEST: spell_id = 37880; break;
2861  case CLASS_SHAMAN: spell_id = 37881; break;
2862  default: return; // ignore for not healing classes
2863  }
2864 
2865  m_caster->CastSpell(m_caster, spell_id, TRIGGERED_OLD_TRIGGERED);
2866  return;
2867  }
2868  case 51640: // Taunt Flag Targeting
2869  {
2870  if (!unitTarget || !unitTarget->IsPlayer())
2871  return;
2872 
2873  float x, y, z;
2874  if (Corpse* corpse = static_cast<Player*>(unitTarget)->GetCorpse())
2875  corpse->GetPosition(x, y, z);
2876  else
2877  unitTarget->GetPosition(x, y, z);
2878 
2879  DoScriptText(-1015072, m_caster, unitTarget);
2880  m_caster->CastSpell(x, y, z, 52605, TRIGGERED_OLD_TRIGGERED); // should also send start
2881  return;
2882  }
2883  }
2884 
2885  break;
2886  }
2887  case SPELLFAMILY_SHAMAN:
2888  {
2889  // Rockbiter Weapon
2890  if (m_spellInfo->SpellFamilyFlags & uint64(0x400000))
2891  {
2892  uint32 spell_id = 0;
2893  switch (m_spellInfo->Id)
2894  {
2895  case 8017: spell_id = 36494; break; // Rank 1
2896  case 8018: spell_id = 36750; break; // Rank 2
2897  case 8019: spell_id = 36755; break; // Rank 3
2898  case 10399: spell_id = 36759; break; // Rank 4
2899  case 16314: spell_id = 36763; break; // Rank 5
2900  case 16315: spell_id = 36766; break; // Rank 6
2901  case 16316: spell_id = 36771; break; // Rank 7
2902  case 25479: spell_id = 36775; break; // Rank 8
2903  case 25485: spell_id = 36499; break; // Rank 9
2904  default:
2905  sLog.outError("Spell::EffectDummy: Spell %u not handled in RW", m_spellInfo->Id);
2906  return;
2907  }
2908 
2909  SpellEntry const* spellInfo = sSpellTemplate.LookupEntry<SpellEntry>(spell_id);
2910 
2911  if (!spellInfo)
2912  {
2913  sLog.outError("WORLD: unknown spell id %i", spell_id);
2914  return;
2915  }
2916 
2917  if (m_caster->GetTypeId() != TYPEID_PLAYER)
2918  return;
2919 
2920  for (int j = BASE_ATTACK; j <= OFF_ATTACK; ++j)
2921  {
2922  if (Item* item = ((Player*)m_caster)->GetWeaponForAttack(WeaponAttackType(j)))
2923  {
2924  if (item->IsFitToSpellRequirements(m_spellInfo))
2925  {
2926  Spell* spell = new Spell(m_caster, spellInfo, TRIGGERED_OLD_TRIGGERED);
2927 
2928  // enchanting spell selected by calculated damage-per-sec in enchanting effect
2929  // at calculation applied affect from Elemental Weapons talent
2930  // real enchantment damage
2931  spell->m_currentBasePoints[1] = damage;
2932 
2933  SpellCastTargets targets;
2934  targets.setItemTarget(item);
2935  spell->SpellStart(&targets);
2936  }
2937  }
2938  }
2939  return;
2940  }
2941  if (m_spellInfo->SpellFamilyFlags & uint64(0x0000000000200000)) // Flametongue Weapon Proc, Ranks
2942  {
2943  if (m_CastItem)
2944  {
2945  // found spelldamage coefficients of 0.381% per 0.1 speed and 15.244 per 4.0 speed
2946  // but own calculation say 0.385 gives at most one point difference to published values
2947  int32 bonusDamage = m_caster->SpellBaseDamageBonusDone(GetSpellSchoolMask(m_spellInfo))
2948  + unitTarget->SpellBaseDamageBonusTaken(GetSpellSchoolMask(m_spellInfo));
2949  // Does Amplify Magic/Dampen Magic influence flametongue? If not, the above addition must be removed.
2950  float weaponSpeed = float(m_CastItem->GetProto()->Delay) / IN_MILLISECONDS;
2951  bonusDamage = m_caster->SpellBonusWithCoeffs(m_spellInfo, 0, bonusDamage, 0, SPELL_DIRECT_DAMAGE, false); // apply spell coeff
2952  int32 totalDamage = (damage * 0.01 * weaponSpeed) + bonusDamage;
2953 
2954  m_caster->CastCustomSpell(unitTarget, 10444, &totalDamage, nullptr, nullptr, TRIGGERED_OLD_TRIGGERED, m_CastItem);
2955  }
2956  else
2957  sLog.outError("Spell::EffectDummy: spell %i requires cast Item", m_spellInfo->Id);
2958 
2959  return;
2960  }
2961  if (m_spellInfo->SpellFamilyFlags & uint64(0x0000000400000000)) // Flametongue Totem Proc, Ranks
2962  {
2963  if (m_CastItem) // Does not scale with gear
2964  {
2965  float weaponSpeed = float(m_CastItem->GetProto()->Delay) / IN_MILLISECONDS;
2966  int32 totalDamage = (damage * 0.01f * weaponSpeed * (m_CastItem->GetEnchantmentModifier() + 100.f) / 100.f);
2967  m_caster->CastCustomSpell(unitTarget, 16368, &totalDamage, nullptr, nullptr, TRIGGERED_OLD_TRIGGERED, m_CastItem);
2968  }
2969  else
2970  sLog.outError("Spell::EffectDummy: spell %i requires cast Item", m_spellInfo->Id);
2971 
2972  return;
2973  }
2974  if (m_spellInfo->Id == 39610) // Mana Tide Totem effect
2975  {
2976  if (!unitTarget || unitTarget->GetPowerType() != POWER_MANA)
2977  return;
2978 
2979  // Regenerate 6% of Total Mana Every 3 secs
2980  int32 EffectBasePoints0 = unitTarget->GetMaxPower(POWER_MANA) * damage / 100;
2981  m_caster->CastCustomSpell(unitTarget, 39609, &EffectBasePoints0, nullptr, nullptr, TRIGGERED_OLD_TRIGGERED, nullptr, nullptr, m_originalCasterGUID);
2982  return;
2983  }
2984 
2985  break;
2986  }
2987  }
2988 
2989  // pet auras
2990  if (PetAura const* petSpell = sSpellMgr.GetPetAura(m_spellInfo->Id))
2991  {
2992  m_caster->AddPetAura(petSpell);
2993  return;
2994  }
2995 
2996  // Script based implementation. Must be used only for not good for implementation in core spell effects
2997  // So called only for not processed cases
2998  bool libraryResult = false;
2999  if (gameObjTarget)
3000  libraryResult = sScriptDevAIMgr.OnEffectDummy(m_caster, m_spellInfo->Id, eff_idx, gameObjTarget, m_originalCasterGUID);
3001  else if (unitTarget && unitTarget->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_UNIT)
3002  libraryResult = sScriptDevAIMgr.OnEffectDummy(m_caster, m_spellInfo->Id, eff_idx, (Creature*)unitTarget, m_originalCasterGUID);
3003  else if (itemTarget)
3004  libraryResult = sScriptDevAIMgr.OnEffectDummy(m_caster, m_spellInfo->Id, eff_idx, itemTarget, m_originalCasterGUID);
3005 
3006  if (libraryResult || (!unitTarget && !gameObjTarget))
3007  return;
3008 
3009  // Previous effect might have started script
3010  if (!ScriptMgr::CanSpellEffectStartDBScript(m_spellInfo, eff_idx))
3011  return;
3012 
3013  auto& data = SpellTargetMgr::GetSpellTargetingData(m_spellInfo->Id);
3014  SpellTargetImplicitType effectTargetType = data.implicitType[eff_idx];
3015 
3016  DEBUG_FILTER_LOG(LOG_FILTER_SPELL_CAST, "Spell ScriptStart spellid %u in EffectDummy", m_spellInfo->Id);
3017  if (effectTargetType == TARGET_TYPE_UNIT || effectTargetType == TARGET_TYPE_UNIT_DEST)
3018  m_trueCaster->GetMap()->ScriptsStart(SCRIPT_TYPE_SPELL, m_spellInfo->Id, m_trueCaster, unitTarget);
3019  else if (effectTargetType == TARGET_TYPE_GAMEOBJECT || (effectTargetType == TARGET_TYPE_LOCK && gameObjTarget))
3020  m_trueCaster->GetMap()->ScriptsStart(SCRIPT_TYPE_SPELL, m_spellInfo->Id, m_trueCaster, gameObjTarget);
3021 }
3022 
3023 void Spell::EffectTriggerSpellWithValue(SpellEffectIndex eff_idx)
3024 {
3025  uint32 triggered_spell_id = m_spellInfo->EffectTriggerSpell[eff_idx];
3026 
3027  // normal case
3028  SpellEntry const* spellInfo = sSpellTemplate.LookupEntry<SpellEntry>(triggered_spell_id);
3029 
3030  if (!spellInfo)
3031  {
3032  // No previous Effect might have started a script
3033  bool startDBScript = unitTarget && ScriptMgr::CanSpellEffectStartDBScript(m_spellInfo, eff_idx);
3034  if (startDBScript)
3035  {
3036  DEBUG_FILTER_LOG(LOG_FILTER_SPELL_CAST, "Spell ScriptStart spellid %u in EffectTriggerSpell", m_spellInfo->Id);
