3037  startDBScript = m_caster->GetMap()->ScriptsStart(SCRIPT_TYPE_SPELL, m_spellInfo->Id, m_caster, unitTarget);
3038  }
3039 
3040  if (!startDBScript)
3041  sLog.outError("EffectTriggerSpell of spell %u: triggering unknown spell id %i", m_spellInfo->Id, triggered_spell_id);
3042  return;
3043  }
3044 
3045  int32 bp = damage;
3046  m_caster->CastCustomSpell(unitTarget, triggered_spell_id, &bp, &bp, &bp, TRIGGERED_OLD_TRIGGERED, m_CastItem, nullptr, m_originalCasterGUID, m_spellInfo);
3047 }
3048 
3049 void Spell::EffectTriggerRitualOfSummoning(SpellEffectIndex eff_idx)
3050 {
3051  uint32 triggered_spell_id = m_spellInfo->EffectTriggerSpell[eff_idx];
3052  SpellEntry const* spellInfo = sSpellTemplate.LookupEntry<SpellEntry>(triggered_spell_id);
3053 
3054  if (!spellInfo)
3055  {
3056  sLog.outError("EffectTriggerRitualOfSummoning of spell %u: triggering unknown spell id %i", m_spellInfo->Id, triggered_spell_id);
3057  return;
3058  }
3059 
3060  finish();
3061 
3062  m_caster->CastSpell(unitTarget, spellInfo, TRIGGERED_NONE);
3063 }
3064 
3065 void Spell::EffectForceCast(SpellEffectIndex effIndex)
3066 {
3067  if (!unitTarget)
3068  return;
3069 
3070  uint32 triggered_spell_id = m_spellInfo->EffectTriggerSpell[effIndex];
3071 
3072  // normal case
3073  SpellEntry const* spellInfo = sSpellTemplate.LookupEntry<SpellEntry>(triggered_spell_id);
3074 
3075  if (!spellInfo)
3076  {
3077  sLog.outError("EffectForceCast of spell %u: triggering unknown spell id %i", m_spellInfo->Id, triggered_spell_id);
3078  return;
3079  }
3080 
3081  int32 basePoints = damage;
3082 
3083  SpellCastTargets targets;
3084 
3085  switch (m_spellInfo->EffectImplicitTargetA[effIndex])
3086  {
3087  case TARGET_LOCATION_UNIT_MINION_POSITION: break; // confirmed by 31348 nothing is forwarded
3088  default:
3089  if (IsSpellRequireTarget(spellInfo))
3090  targets.setUnitTarget(unitTarget);
3091  break;
3092  }
3093 
3094  if (spellInfo->Targets & TARGET_FLAG_DEST_LOCATION)
3095  {
3096  if (m_targets.m_targetMask & TARGET_FLAG_DEST_LOCATION)
3097  {
3098  float x, y, z;
3099  m_targets.getDestination(x, y, z);
3100  targets.setDestination(x, y, z);
3101  }
3102  else if (unitTarget)
3103  {
3104  float x, y, z;
3105  unitTarget->GetPosition(x, y, z);
3106  targets.setDestination(x, y, z);
3107  }
3108  }
3109 
3110  // spell effect 141 needs to be cast as custom with basePoints
3111  if (m_spellInfo->Effect[effIndex] == SPELL_EFFECT_FORCE_CAST_WITH_VALUE)
3112  unitTarget->CastCustomSpell(targets, spellInfo, &basePoints, &basePoints, &basePoints, TRIGGERED_OLD_TRIGGERED, nullptr, nullptr, ObjectGuid(), m_spellInfo);
3113  else
3114  unitTarget->CastSpell(targets, spellInfo, TRIGGERED_OLD_TRIGGERED, nullptr, nullptr, ObjectGuid(), m_spellInfo);
3115 }
3116 
3117 void Spell::EffectTriggerSpell(SpellEffectIndex effIndex)
3118 {
3119  uint32 triggered_spell_id = m_spellInfo->EffectTriggerSpell[effIndex];
3120 
3121  // special cases
3122  switch (triggered_spell_id)
3123  {
3124  case 23209: // Terrordale Haunting Spirit
3125  if (urand(1, 100) > 55)
3126  return;
3127  break;
3128  case 23253: // Terrordale Haunting Spirit
3129  if (urand(1, 100) > 35)
3130  return;
3131  break;
3132  // Flame Wreath: Explosion
3133  case 29950:
3134  m_caster->RemoveAurasDueToSpellByCancel(29947);
3135  return;
3136  case 44949:
3137  // triggered spell have same category
3138  if (m_caster->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_PLAYER)
3139  m_caster->RemoveSpellCooldown(triggered_spell_id);
3140  break;
3141  case 41967: // Priest Shadowfiend (34433) - handled in spell script
3142  case 47531: // Dismiss pet - suppress error
3143  return;
3144  }
3145 
3146  // normal case
3147  SpellEntry const* spellInfo = sSpellTemplate.LookupEntry<SpellEntry>(triggered_spell_id);
3148  if (!spellInfo)
3149  {
3150  sLog.outError("EffectTriggerSpell of spell %u: triggering unknown spell id %i", m_spellInfo->Id, triggered_spell_id);
3151  return;
3152  }
3153 
3154  // select formal caster for triggered spell
3155  Unit* caster = m_caster;
3156 
3157  // some triggered spells require specific equipment
3158  if (spellInfo->EquippedItemClass >= 0 && m_caster->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_PLAYER)
3159  {
3160  // main hand weapon required
3161  if (spellInfo->AttributesEx3 & SPELL_ATTR_EX3_REQUIRES_MAIN_HAND_WEAPON)
3162  {
3163  Item* item = ((Player*)m_caster)->GetWeaponForAttack(BASE_ATTACK, true, false);
3164 
3165  // skip spell if no weapon in slot or broken
3166  if (!item)
3167  return;
3168 
3169  // skip spell if weapon not fit to triggered spell
3170  if (!item->IsFitToSpellRequirements(spellInfo))
3171  return;
3172  }
3173 
3174  // offhand hand weapon required
3175  if (spellInfo->AttributesEx3 & SPELL_ATTR_EX3_REQUIRES_OFFHAND_WEAPON)
3176  {
3177  Item* item = ((Player*)m_caster)->GetWeaponForAttack(OFF_ATTACK, true, false);
3178 
3179  // skip spell if no weapon in slot or broken
3180  if (!item)
3181  return;
3182 
3183  // skip spell if weapon not fit to triggered spell
3184  if (!item->IsFitToSpellRequirements(spellInfo))
3185  return;
3186  }
3187  }
3188 
3189  SpellCastTargets targets;
3190 
3191  switch (m_spellInfo->EffectImplicitTargetA[effIndex])
3192  {
3193  case TARGET_LOCATION_UNIT_MINION_POSITION: break; // confirmed by 31348 nothing is forwarded
3194  default:
3195  if (IsSpellRequireTarget(spellInfo))
3196  targets.setUnitTarget(unitTarget);
3197  break;
3198  }
3199 
3200  if (spellInfo->Targets & TARGET_FLAG_DEST_LOCATION)
3201  {
3202  if (m_targets.m_targetMask & TARGET_FLAG_DEST_LOCATION)
3203  {
3204  float x, y, z;
3205  m_targets.getDestination(x, y, z);
3206  targets.setDestination(x, y, z);
3207  }
3208  else if (unitTarget)
3209  {
3210  float x, y, z;
3211  unitTarget->GetPosition(x, y, z);
3212  targets.setDestination(x, y, z);
3213  }
3214  }
3215 
3216  caster->CastSpell(targets, spellInfo, TRIGGERED_OLD_TRIGGERED, m_CastItem, nullptr, m_originalCasterGUID, m_spellInfo);
3217 }
3218 
3219 void Spell::EffectTriggerMissileSpell(SpellEffectIndex effect_idx)
3220 {
3221  uint32 triggered_spell_id = m_spellInfo->EffectTriggerSpell[effect_idx];
3222 
3223  // normal case
3224  SpellEntry const* spellInfo = sSpellTemplate.LookupEntry<SpellEntry>(triggered_spell_id);
3225 
3226  if (!spellInfo)
3227  {
3228  if (unitTarget)
3229  {
3230  DEBUG_FILTER_LOG(LOG_FILTER_SPELL_CAST, "Spell ScriptStart spellid %u in EffectTriggerMissileSpell", m_spellInfo->Id);
3231  m_caster->GetMap()->ScriptsStart(SCRIPT_TYPE_SPELL, m_spellInfo->Id, m_caster, unitTarget);
3232  }
3233  else
3234  sLog.outError("EffectTriggerMissileSpell of spell %u (eff: %u): triggering unknown spell id %u",
3235  m_spellInfo->Id, effect_idx, triggered_spell_id);
3236  return;
3237  }
3238 
3239  if (m_CastItem)
3240  DEBUG_FILTER_LOG(LOG_FILTER_SPELL_CAST, "WORLD: cast Item spellId - %i", spellInfo->Id);
3241 
3242  SpellCastTargets targets;
3243  if (unitTarget)
3244  {
3245  if (spellInfo->Targets & TARGET_FLAG_DEST_LOCATION)
3246  targets.setDestination(unitTarget->GetPositionX(), unitTarget->GetPositionY(), unitTarget->GetPositionZ());
3247  else
3248  targets.setUnitTarget(unitTarget);
3249  }
3250  else if (gameObjTarget)
3251  targets.setGOTarget(gameObjTarget);
3252  else if (spellInfo->EffectImplicitTargetA[0] != TARGET_LOCATION_CASTER_DEST) // TODO: Add a proper filling mechanism
3253  targets.setDestination(m_targets.m_destPos.x, m_targets.m_destPos.y, m_targets.m_destPos.z);
3254  m_caster->CastSpell(targets, spellInfo, TRIGGERED_OLD_TRIGGERED, m_CastItem, nullptr, m_originalCasterGUID, m_spellInfo);
3255 }
3256 
3257 void Spell::EffectTeleportUnits(SpellEffectIndex eff_idx) // TODO - Use target settings for this effect!
3258 {
3259  if (!unitTarget || unitTarget->IsTaxiFlying())
3260  return;
3261 
3262  // Target dependend on TargetB, if there is none provided, decide dependend on A
3263  uint32 targetType = m_spellInfo->EffectImplicitTargetB[eff_idx];
3264  if (!targetType)
3265  targetType = m_spellInfo->EffectImplicitTargetA[eff_idx];
3266 
3267  // If not exist data for dest location - return
3268  if (!(m_targets.m_targetMask & TARGET_FLAG_DEST_LOCATION))
3269  {
3270  sLog.outError("Spell::EffectTeleportUnits - unknown EffectImplicitTargetB[%u] = %u for spell ID %u", eff_idx, m_spellInfo->EffectImplicitTargetB[eff_idx], m_spellInfo->Id);
3271  return;
3272  }
3273  // Init dest coordinates
3274  Position position = m_targets.getDestination();
3275  float orientation = m_targets.m_destPos.o;
3276  if (orientation == 0.f) // not filled in spell targeting
3277  {
3278  if (m_caster != unitTarget)
3279  orientation = position.GetAngle(m_caster->GetPositionX(), m_caster->GetPositionY());
3280  else
3281  orientation = unitTarget->GetOrientation();
3282  }
3283 
3284  // Teleport
3285  if (m_targets.m_mapId == UINT32_MAX || m_targets.m_mapId == unitTarget->GetMapId())
3286  {
3287  if (unitTarget->IsPlayer() && unitTarget->IsMoving())
3288  position.z += 0.5f;
3289  unitTarget->NearTeleportTo(position.x, position.y, position.z, orientation, unitTarget == m_caster,
3290  m_spellInfo->EffectImplicitTargetA[eff_idx] == TARGET_LOCATION_DATABASE ||
3291  m_spellInfo->EffectImplicitTargetB[eff_idx] == TARGET_LOCATION_DATABASE);
3292  }
3293  else if (unitTarget->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_PLAYER)
3294  {
3295  Player* player = static_cast<Player*>(unitTarget);
3296  MapEntry const* targetMapEntry = sMapStore.LookupEntry(m_targets.m_mapId);
3297  if (!targetMapEntry)
3298  return;
3299  if (!player->IsAlive() && targetMapEntry->IsDungeon())
3300  {
3301  auto data = player->CheckAndRevivePlayerOnDungeonEnter(targetMapEntry, m_targets.m_mapId);
3302  if (!data.first)
3303  return;
3304  }
3305  player->TeleportTo(m_targets.m_mapId, position.x, position.y, position.z, orientation, unitTarget == m_caster ? TELE_TO_SPELL : 0);
3306  }
3307 
3308  // post effects for TARGET_LOCATION_DATABASE
3309  switch (m_spellInfo->Id)
3310  {
3311  case 23441: // Ultrasafe Transporter: Gadgetzan
3312  {
3313  // Wrong destination already rolled for, only handle minor malfunction on sucess
3314  m_caster->CastSpell(m_caster, 23450, TRIGGERED_OLD_TRIGGERED); // Transporter Arrival
3315 
3316  return;
3317  }
3318  case 23442: // Dimensional Ripper - Everlook
3319  {
3320  // Roll for major malfunction (1/6); 23450 = success | 23449 = malfunction (being set afire)
3321  m_caster->CastSpell(m_caster, (urand(0, 5) ? 23450 : 23449), TRIGGERED_OLD_TRIGGERED);
3322 
3323  return;
3324  }
3325  // Ultrasafe Transporter: Toshley's Station
3326  case 36941:
3327  {
3328  if (roll_chance_i(50)) // 50% success
3329  {
3330  int32 rand_eff = urand(1, 7);
3331  switch (rand_eff)
3332  {
3333  case 1:
3334  // soul split - evil
3335  m_caster->CastSpell(m_caster, 36900, TRIGGERED_OLD_TRIGGERED);
3336  break;
3337  case 2:
3338  // soul split - good
3339  m_caster->CastSpell(m_caster, 36901, TRIGGERED_OLD_TRIGGERED);
3340  break;
3341  case 3:
3342  // Increase the size
3343  m_caster->CastSpell(m_caster, 36895, TRIGGERED_OLD_TRIGGERED);
3344  break;
3345  case 4:
3346  // Decrease the size
3347  m_caster->CastSpell(m_caster, 36893, TRIGGERED_OLD_TRIGGERED);
3348  break;
3349  case 5:
3350  // Transform
3351  {
3352  if (((Player*)m_caster)->GetTeam() == ALLIANCE)
3353  m_caster->CastSpell(m_caster, 36897, TRIGGERED_OLD_TRIGGERED);
3354  else
3355  m_caster->CastSpell(m_caster, 36899, TRIGGERED_OLD_TRIGGERED);
3356  break;
3357  }
3358  case 6:
3359  // chicken
3360  m_caster->CastSpell(m_caster, 36940, TRIGGERED_OLD_TRIGGERED);
3361  break;
3362  case 7:
3363  // evil twin
3364  m_caster->CastSpell(m_caster, 23445, TRIGGERED_OLD_TRIGGERED);
3365  break;
3366  }
3367  }
3368  return;
3369  }
3370  // Dimensional Ripper - Area 52
3371  case 36890:
3372  {
3373  if (roll_chance_i(50)) // 50% success
3374  {
3375  int32 rand_eff = urand(1, 4);
3376  switch (rand_eff)
3377  {
3378  case 1:
3379  // soul split - evil
3380  m_caster->CastSpell(m_caster, 36900, TRIGGERED_OLD_TRIGGERED);
3381  break;
3382  case 2:
3383  // soul split - good
3384  m_caster->CastSpell(m_caster, 36901, TRIGGERED_OLD_TRIGGERED);
3385  break;
3386  case 3:
3387  // Increase the size
3388  m_caster->CastSpell(m_caster, 36895, TRIGGERED_OLD_TRIGGERED);
3389  break;
3390  case 4:
3391  // Transform
3392  {
3393  if (((Player*)m_caster)->GetTeam() == ALLIANCE)
3394  m_caster->CastSpell(m_caster, 36897, TRIGGERED_OLD_TRIGGERED);
3395  else
3396  m_caster->CastSpell(m_caster, 36899, TRIGGERED_OLD_TRIGGERED);
3397  break;
3398  }
3399  }
3400  }
3401  return;
3402  }
3403  }
3404 }
3405 
3406 void Spell::EffectApplyAura(SpellEffectIndex eff_idx)
3407 {
3408  if (!unitTarget)
3409  return;
3410 
3411  // ghost spell check, allow apply any auras at player loading in ghost mode (will be cleanup after load)
3412  if ((!unitTarget->IsAlive() && !(IsDeathOnlySpell(m_spellInfo) || IsDeathPersistentSpell(m_spellInfo))) &&
3413  (unitTarget->GetTypeId() != TYPEID_PLAYER || !((Player*)unitTarget)->GetSession()->PlayerLoading()))
3414  return;
3415 
3416  // GO auras have caster == nullptr
3417  Unit* caster = GetAffectiveCaster();
3418 
3419  DEBUG_FILTER_LOG(LOG_FILTER_SPELL_CAST, "Spell: Aura is: %u", m_spellInfo->EffectApplyAuraName[eff_idx]);
3420 
3421  Aura* aur = CreateAura(m_spellInfo, eff_idx, &damage, &m_currentBasePoints[eff_idx], m_spellAuraHolder, unitTarget, caster, m_CastItem, GetScriptValue());
3422  m_spellAuraHolder->AddAura(aur, eff_idx);
3423 }
3424 
3425 void Spell::EffectUnlearnSpecialization(SpellEffectIndex eff_idx)
3426 {
3427  if (!unitTarget || unitTarget->GetTypeId() != TYPEID_PLAYER)
3428  return;
3429 
3430  Player* _player = (Player*)unitTarget;
3431  uint32 spellToUnlearn = m_spellInfo->EffectTriggerSpell[eff_idx];
3432 
3433  _player->removeSpell(spellToUnlearn);
3434 
3435  if (WorldObject const* caster = GetCastingObject())
3436  DEBUG_LOG("Spell: %s has unlearned spell %u at %s", _player->GetGuidStr().c_str(), spellToUnlearn, caster->GetGuidStr().c_str());
3437 }
3438 
3439 void Spell::EffectPowerDrain(SpellEffectIndex eff_idx)
3440 {
3441  if (m_spellInfo->EffectMiscValue[eff_idx] < 0 || m_spellInfo->EffectMiscValue[eff_idx] >= MAX_POWERS)
3442  return;
3443 
3444  Powers powerType = Powers(m_spellInfo->EffectMiscValue[eff_idx]);
3445 
3446  if (!unitTarget)
3447  return;
3448  if (!unitTarget->IsAlive())
3449  return;
3450  if (unitTarget->GetPowerType() != powerType)
3451  return;
3452  if (damage < 0)
3453  return;
3454 
3455  uint32 curPower = unitTarget->GetPower(powerType);
3456 
3457  // add spell damage bonus
3458  damage = m_caster->SpellDamageBonusDone(unitTarget, m_spellSchoolMask, m_spellInfo, uint32(damage), SPELL_DIRECT_DAMAGE);
3459  damage = unitTarget->SpellDamageBonusTaken(m_caster, m_spellSchoolMask, m_spellInfo, uint32(damage), SPELL_DIRECT_DAMAGE);
3460 
3461  uint32 power = damage;
3462 
3463  power -= unitTarget->GetResilienceRatingDamageReduction(power, SpellDmgClass(m_spellInfo->DmgClass), false, powerType);
3464 
3465  int32 new_damage;
3466  if (curPower < power)
3467  new_damage = curPower;
3468  else
3469  new_damage = power;
3470 
3471  unitTarget->ModifyPower(powerType, -new_damage);
3472 
3473  float gainMultiplier = 1.0f;
3474 
3475  // Do not gain power from self drain or when power types don't match
3476  if (m_caster->GetPowerType() == powerType && m_caster != unitTarget)
3477  {
3478  gainMultiplier = m_spellInfo->EffectMultipleValue[eff_idx];
3479 
3480  if (Player* modOwner = m_caster->GetSpellModOwner())
3481  modOwner->ApplySpellMod(m_spellInfo->Id, SPELLMOD_MULTIPLE_VALUE, gainMultiplier);
3482  }
3483 
3484  m_spellLog.AddLog(uint32(SPELL_EFFECT_POWER_DRAIN), unitTarget->GetPackGUID(), new_damage, uint32(powerType), gainMultiplier);
3485 
3486  if (int32 gain = int32(new_damage * gainMultiplier))
3487  m_caster->EnergizeBySpell(m_caster, m_spellInfo, gain, powerType, false);
3488 }
3489 
3490 void Spell::EffectSendEvent(SpellEffectIndex effectIndex)
3491 {
3492  DEBUG_FILTER_LOG(LOG_FILTER_SPELL_CAST, "Spell ScriptStart %u for spellid %u in EffectSendEvent ", m_spellInfo->EffectMiscValue[effectIndex], m_spellInfo->Id);
3493 
3494  StartEvents_Event(m_trueCaster->GetMap(), m_spellInfo->EffectMiscValue[effectIndex], m_trueCaster, m_eventTarget, true);
3495 }
3496 
3497 void Spell::EffectPowerBurn(SpellEffectIndex eff_idx)
3498 {
3499  if (m_spellInfo->EffectMiscValue[eff_idx] < 0 || m_spellInfo->EffectMiscValue[eff_idx] >= MAX_POWERS)
3500  return;
3501 
3502  Powers powertype = Powers(m_spellInfo->EffectMiscValue[eff_idx]);
3503 
3504  if (!unitTarget)
3505  return;
3506  if (!unitTarget->IsAlive())
3507  return;
3508  if (unitTarget->GetPowerType() != powertype)
3509  return;
3510  if (damage < 0)
3511  return;
3512 
3513  int32 curPower = int32(unitTarget->GetPower(powertype));
3514 
3515  int32 power = damage;
3516 
3517  power -= unitTarget->GetResilienceRatingDamageReduction(uint32(power), SpellDmgClass(m_spellInfo->DmgClass), false, powertype);
3518 
3519  int32 new_damage = (curPower < power) ? curPower : power;
3520 
3521  unitTarget->ModifyPower(powertype, -new_damage);
3522  float multiplier = m_spellInfo->EffectMultipleValue[eff_idx];
3523 
3524  if (Player* modOwner = m_caster->GetSpellModOwner())
3525  modOwner->ApplySpellMod(m_spellInfo->Id, SPELLMOD_MULTIPLE_VALUE, multiplier);
3526 
3527  new_damage = int32(new_damage * multiplier);
3528 
3529  m_damagePerEffect[eff_idx] = CalculateSpellEffectDamage(unitTarget, new_damage);
3530 
3531  // should use here effect POWER_DRAIN because POWER_BURN is not implemented on client
3532  m_spellLog.AddLog(uint32(SPELL_EFFECT_POWER_DRAIN), unitTarget->GetPackGUID(), new_damage, uint32(powertype), multiplier);
3533 }
3534 
3535 void Spell::EffectHeal(SpellEffectIndex eff_idx)
3536 {
3537  if (unitTarget && unitTarget->IsAlive() && damage >= 0)
3538  {
3539  // Try to get original caster
3540  Unit* caster = GetAffectiveCaster();
3541  if (!caster)
3542  return;
3543 
3544  int32 addhealth = damage;
3545 
3546  // Vessel of the Naaru (Vial of the Sunwell trinket)
3547  if (m_spellInfo->Id == 45064)
3548  {
3549  // Amount of heal - depends from stacked Holy Energy
3550  int damageAmount = 0;
3551  Unit::AuraList const& mDummyAuras = m_caster->GetAurasByType(SPELL_AURA_DUMMY);
3552  for (Unit::AuraList::const_iterator i = mDummyAuras.begin(); i != mDummyAuras.end(); ++i)
3553  if ((*i)->GetId() == 45062)
3554  damageAmount += (*i)->GetModifier()->m_amount;
3555  if (damageAmount)
3556  m_caster->RemoveAurasDueToSpell(45062);
3557 
3558  addhealth += damageAmount;
3559  }
3560  // Swiftmend - consumes Regrowth or Rejuvenation
3561  else if (m_spellInfo->TargetAuraState == AURA_STATE_SWIFTMEND && unitTarget->HasAuraState(AURA_STATE_SWIFTMEND))
3562  {
3563  Unit::AuraList const& RejorRegr = unitTarget->GetAurasByType(SPELL_AURA_PERIODIC_HEAL);
3564  // find most short by duration
3565  Aura* targetAura = nullptr;
3566  for (Unit::AuraList::const_iterator i = RejorRegr.begin(); i != RejorRegr.end(); ++i)
3567  {
3568  if ((*i)->GetSpellProto()->SpellFamilyName == SPELLFAMILY_DRUID &&
3569  // Regrowth or Rejuvenation 0x40 | 0x10
3570  ((*i)->GetSpellProto()->SpellFamilyFlags & uint64(0x0000000000000050)))
3571  {
3572  if (!targetAura || (*i)->GetAuraDuration() < targetAura->GetAuraDuration())
3573  targetAura = *i;
3574  }
3575  }
3576 
3577  if (!targetAura)
3578  {
3579  sLog.outError("Target (GUID: %u TypeId: %u) has aurastate AURA_STATE_SWIFTMEND but no matching aura.", unitTarget->GetGUIDLow(), unitTarget->GetTypeId());
3580  return;
3581  }
3582  int idx = 0;
3583  while (idx < 3)
3584  {
3585  if (targetAura->GetSpellProto()->EffectApplyAuraName[idx] == SPELL_AURA_PERIODIC_HEAL)
3586  break;
3587  idx++;
3588  }
3589 
3590  int32 tickheal = targetAura->GetModifier()->m_amount;
3591  int32 tickcount = GetSpellDuration(targetAura->GetSpellProto()) / targetAura->GetSpellProto()->EffectAmplitude[idx];
3592 
3593  unitTarget->RemoveAurasByCasterSpell(targetAura->GetId(), targetAura->GetCasterGuid());
3594 
3595  addhealth += tickheal * tickcount;
3596  }
3597  else if (m_spellInfo->SpellFamilyName == SPELLFAMILY_POTION)
3598  {
3599  if (m_caster->HasAura(17619)) // Alchemists stone
3600  addhealth *= 1.4f; // increase healing by 40%
3601  }
3602  else
3603  {
3604  switch (m_spellInfo->Id)
3605  {
3606  // Crusader Enchant: Holy Strength amount decrease by 4% each level after 60
3607  case 20007:
3608  {
3609  if (GetCaster()->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_PLAYER && GetCaster()->GetLevel() > 60)
3610  addhealth = int32(addhealth * (1 - (((float(GetCaster()->GetLevel()) - 60) * 4) / 100)));
3611  break;
3612  }
3613  // Vessel of the Naaru (Vial of the Sunwell trinket)
3614  case 45064:
3615  {
3616  // Amount of heal - depends from stacked Holy Energy
3617  int damageAmount = 0;
3618  Unit::AuraList const& mDummyAuras = m_caster->GetAurasByType(SPELL_AURA_DUMMY);
3619  for (Unit::AuraList::const_iterator i = mDummyAuras.begin(); i != mDummyAuras.end(); ++i)
3620  if ((*i)->GetId() == 45062)
3621  damageAmount += (*i)->GetModifier()->m_amount;
3622  if (damageAmount)
3623  m_caster->RemoveAurasDueToSpell(45062);
3624 
3625  addhealth += damageAmount;
3626  break;
3627 
3628  }
3629  }
3630  }
3631 
3632  addhealth = caster->SpellHealingBonusDone(unitTarget, m_spellInfo, addhealth, HEAL);
3633  addhealth = unitTarget->SpellHealingBonusTaken(caster, m_spellInfo, addhealth, HEAL);
3634 
3635  m_healingPerEffect[eff_idx] = addhealth;
3636  }
3637 }
3638 
3639 void Spell::EffectHealPct(SpellEffectIndex eff_idx)
3640 {
3641  if (unitTarget && unitTarget->IsAlive() && damage >= 0)
3642  {
3643  // Try to get original caster
3644  Unit* caster = GetAffectiveCaster();
3645  if (!caster)
3646  return;
3647 
3648  uint32 addhealth = unitTarget->GetMaxHealth() * damage / 100;
3649 
3650  addhealth = caster->SpellHealingBonusDone(unitTarget, m_spellInfo, addhealth, HEAL);
3651  addhealth = unitTarget->SpellHealingBonusTaken(caster, m_spellInfo, addhealth, HEAL);
3652 
3653  m_healingPerEffect[eff_idx] = addhealth;
3654  }
3655 }
3656 
3657 void Spell::EffectHealMechanical(SpellEffectIndex eff_idx)
3658 {
3659  // Mechanic creature type should be correctly checked by targetCreatureType field
3660  if (unitTarget && unitTarget->IsAlive() && damage >= 0)
3661  {
3662  // Try to get original caster
3663  Unit* caster = GetAffectiveCaster();
3664  if (!caster)
3665  return;
3666 
3667  uint32 addhealth = caster->SpellHealingBonusDone(unitTarget, m_spellInfo, damage, HEAL);
3668  addhealth = unitTarget->SpellHealingBonusTaken(caster, m_spellInfo, addhealth, HEAL);
3669 
3670  m_healingPerEffect[eff_idx] = addhealth;
3671  }
3672 }
3673 
3674 void Spell::EffectHealthLeech(SpellEffectIndex eff_idx)
3675 {
3676  if (!unitTarget)
3677  return;
3678  if (!unitTarget->IsAlive())
3679  return;
3680 
3681  if (damage < 0)
3682  return;
3683 
3684  DEBUG_FILTER_LOG(LOG_FILTER_SPELL_CAST, "HealthLeech :%i", damage);
3685 
3686  uint32 curHealth = unitTarget->GetHealth();
3687  damage = m_caster->SpellNonMeleeDamageLog(unitTarget, m_spellInfo->Id, damage);
3688  if ((int32)curHealth < damage)
3689  damage = curHealth;
3690 
3691  float multiplier = m_spellInfo->EffectMultipleValue[eff_idx];
3692 
3693  if (Player* modOwner = m_caster->GetSpellModOwner())
3694  modOwner->ApplySpellMod(m_spellInfo->Id, SPELLMOD_MULTIPLE_VALUE, multiplier);
3695 
3696  uint32 heal = uint32(damage * multiplier);
3697  if (m_caster->IsAlive())
3698  {
3699  heal = m_caster->SpellHealingBonusTaken(m_caster, m_spellInfo, heal, HEAL);
3700  // TODO: at hit need to schedule a (delayed) heal effect execution on caster
3701  // order of packets for death coil - start, go, delay, dmg log, delay, heal log
3702  m_caster->DealHeal(m_caster, heal, m_spellInfo);
3703  }
3704 }
3705 
3706 bool Spell::DoCreateItem(SpellEffectIndex /*eff_idx*/, uint32 itemtype, bool reportError)
3707 {
3708  if (!unitTarget || unitTarget->GetTypeId() != TYPEID_PLAYER)
3709  return false;
3710 
3711  Player* player = (Player*)unitTarget;
3712 
3713  uint32 newitemid = itemtype;
3714  ItemPrototype const* pProto = ObjectMgr::GetItemPrototype(newitemid);
3715  if (!pProto)
3716  {
3717  if (reportError)
3718  player->SendEquipError(EQUIP_ERR_ITEM_NOT_FOUND, nullptr, nullptr);
3719  return false;
3720  }
3721 
3722  // bg reward have some special in code work
3723  uint32 bgType = 0;
3724  switch (m_spellInfo->Id)
3725  {
3726  case SPELL_AV_MARK_WINNER:
3727  case SPELL_AV_MARK_LOSER:
3728  bgType = BATTLEGROUND_AV;
3729  break;
3730  case SPELL_WS_MARK_WINNER:
3731  case SPELL_WS_MARK_LOSER:
3732  bgType = BATTLEGROUND_WS;
3733  break;
3734  case SPELL_AB_MARK_WINNER:
3735  case SPELL_AB_MARK_LOSER:
3736  bgType = BATTLEGROUND_AB;
3737  break;
3738  default:
3739  break;
3740  }
3741 
3742  uint32 num_to_add = damage;
3743 
3744  if (num_to_add < 1)
3745  num_to_add = 1;
3746  if (num_to_add > pProto->Stackable)
3747  num_to_add = pProto->Stackable;
3748 
3749  // init items_count to 1, since 1 item will be created regardless of specialization
3750  int items_count = 1;
3751  // the chance to create additional items
3752  float additionalCreateChance = 0.0f;
3753  // the maximum number of created additional items
3754  uint8 additionalMaxNum = 0;
3755  // get the chance and maximum number for creating extra items
3756  if (canCreateExtraItems(player, m_spellInfo->Id, additionalCreateChance, additionalMaxNum))
3757  {
3758  // roll with this chance till we roll not to create or we create the max num
3759  while (roll_chance_f(additionalCreateChance) && items_count <= additionalMaxNum)
3760  ++items_count;
3761  }
3762 
3763  // really will be created more items
3764  num_to_add *= items_count;
3765 
3766  // can the player store the new item?
3767  ItemPosCountVec dest;
3768  uint32 no_space = 0;
3769  InventoryResult msg = player->CanStoreNewItem(NULL_BAG, NULL_SLOT, dest, newitemid, num_to_add, &no_space);
3770  if (msg != EQUIP_ERR_OK)
3771  {
3772  // convert to possible store amount
3773  if (msg == EQUIP_ERR_INVENTORY_FULL || msg == EQUIP_ERR_CANT_CARRY_MORE_OF_THIS)
3774  num_to_add -= no_space;
3775 
3776  // for battleground marks send by mail if not add all expected
3777  if (no_space > 0 && bgType)
3778  {
3779  if (BattleGround * bg = sBattleGroundMgr.GetBattleGroundTemplate(BattleGroundTypeId(bgType)))
3780  {
3781  bg->SendRewardMarkByMail(player, newitemid, no_space);
3782  return true;
3783  }
3784  }
3785 
3786  // if not created by another reason from full inventory or unique items amount limitation
3787  if (reportError)
3788  player->SendEquipError(msg, nullptr, nullptr, newitemid);
3789  return false;
3790  }
3791 
3792  if (num_to_add)
3793  {
3794  // create the new item and store it
3795  Item* pItem = player->StoreNewItem(dest, newitemid, true, Item::GenerateItemRandomPropertyId(newitemid));
3796 
3797  // was it successful? return error if not
3798  if (!pItem)
3799  {
3800  if (reportError)
3801  player->SendEquipError(EQUIP_ERR_ITEM_NOT_FOUND, nullptr, nullptr);
3802  return false;
3803  }
3804 
3805  // set the "Crafted by ..." property of the item
3806  if (pItem->GetProto()->Class != ITEM_CLASS_CONSUMABLE && pItem->GetProto()->Class != ITEM_CLASS_QUEST)
3807  pItem->SetGuidValue(ITEM_FIELD_CREATOR, player->GetObjectGuid());
3808 
3809  // send info to the client
3810  player->SendNewItem(pItem, num_to_add, true, !bgType);
3811 
3812  // we succeeded in creating at least one item, so a levelup is possible
3813  if (!bgType)
3814  player->UpdateCraftSkill(m_spellInfo->Id);
3815  }
3816  return true;
3817 }
3818 
3819 void Spell::EffectCreateItem(SpellEffectIndex eff_idx)
3820 {
3821  if (DoCreateItem(eff_idx, m_spellInfo->EffectItemType[eff_idx], !m_spellInfo->HasAttribute(SPELL_ATTR_DO_NOT_LOG)))
3822  m_spellLog.AddLog(uint32(SPELL_EFFECT_CREATE_ITEM), m_spellInfo->EffectItemType[eff_idx]);
3823 }
3824 
3825 void Spell::EffectPersistentAA(SpellEffectIndex eff_idx)
3826 {
3827  Unit* caster = GetAffectiveCaster();
3828  // FIXME: in case wild GO will used wrong affective caster (target in fact) as dynobject owner
3829  if (!caster)
3830  caster = m_caster;
3831 
3832  float radius = GetSpellRadius(sSpellRadiusStore.LookupEntry(m_spellInfo->EffectRadiusIndex[eff_idx]));
3833 
3834  if (Player* modOwner = caster->GetSpellModOwner())
3835  modOwner->ApplySpellMod(m_spellInfo->Id, SPELLMOD_RADIUS, radius);
3836 
3837  SpellTarget target = SpellTarget(m_spellInfo->EffectImplicitTargetB[eff_idx] ? m_spellInfo->EffectImplicitTargetB[eff_idx] : m_spellInfo->EffectImplicitTargetA[eff_idx]);
3838 
3839  DynamicObject* dynObj = new DynamicObject;
3840  if (!dynObj->Create(caster->GetMap()->GenerateLocalLowGuid(HIGHGUID_DYNAMICOBJECT), caster, m_spellInfo->Id,
3841  eff_idx, m_targets.m_destPos.x, m_targets.m_destPos.y, m_targets.m_destPos.z, m_duration, radius, DYNAMIC_OBJECT_AREA_SPELL, target, damage, m_currentBasePoints[eff_idx]))
3842  {
3843  delete dynObj;
3844  return;
3845  }
3846 
3847  caster->AddDynObject(dynObj);
3848  caster->GetMap()->Add(dynObj);
3849 
3850  // Potential Hack - at the time of channel start Dynamic Object is not created yet, so have to do it here
3851  // Sent in next Object Update so for client its the same
3852  if (eff_idx == EFFECT_INDEX_0 && IsChanneledSpell(m_spellInfo))
3853  {
3854  m_caster->SetChannelObject(dynObj);
3855  m_caster->SendForcedObjectUpdate();
3856  }
3857 }
3858 
3859 void Spell::EffectEnergize(SpellEffectIndex eff_idx)
3860 {
3861  if (!unitTarget)
3862  return;
3863  if (!unitTarget->IsAlive())
3864  return;
3865 
3866  if (m_spellInfo->EffectMiscValue[eff_idx] < 0 || m_spellInfo->EffectMiscValue[eff_idx] >= MAX_POWERS)
3867  return;
3868 
3869  Powers power = Powers(m_spellInfo->EffectMiscValue[eff_idx]);
3870 
3871  // Some level depends spells
3872  int level_multiplier = 0;
3873  int level_diff = 0;
3874  switch (m_spellInfo->Id)
3875  {
3876  case 5530:
3877  if (m_caster->getClass() == CLASS_ROGUE) // Warrior and rogue use same spell, on rogue not supposed to give resource, WTF game devs?!
3878  return;
3879  break;
3880  case 9512: // Restore Energy
3881  level_diff = m_caster->GetLevel() - 40;
3882  level_multiplier = 2;
3883  break;
3884  case 24571: // Blood Fury
3885  level_diff = m_caster->GetLevel() - 60;
3886  level_multiplier = 10;
3887  break;
3888  case 24532: // Burst of Energy
3889  level_diff = m_caster->GetLevel() - 60;
3890  level_multiplier = 4;
3891  break;
3892  default:
3893  break;
3894  }
3895 
3896  if (m_spellInfo->SpellFamilyName == SPELLFAMILY_POTION)
3897  {
3898  if (m_caster->HasAura(17619)) // Alchemists stone
3899  damage *= 1.4f; // increase healing by 40%
3900  }
3901 
3902  if (level_diff > 0)
3903  damage -= level_multiplier * level_diff;
3904 
3905  if (damage < 0)
3906  return;
3907 
3908  if (unitTarget->GetMaxPower(power) == 0)
3909  return;
3910 
3911  m_caster->EnergizeBySpell(unitTarget, m_spellInfo, damage, power);
3912 
3913  // Mad Alchemist's Potion
3914  if (m_spellInfo->Id == 45051)
3915  {
3916  // find elixirs on target
3917  uint32 elixir_mask = 0;
3918  Unit::SpellAuraHolderMap& Auras = unitTarget->GetSpellAuraHolderMap();
3919  for (Unit::SpellAuraHolderMap::iterator itr = Auras.begin(); itr != Auras.end(); ++itr)
3920  {
3921  uint32 spell_id = itr->second->GetId();
3922  if (uint32 mask = sSpellMgr.GetSpellElixirMask(spell_id))
3923  elixir_mask |= mask;
3924  }
3925 
3926  // get available elixir mask any not active type from battle/guardian (and flask if no any)
3927  elixir_mask = (elixir_mask & ELIXIR_FLASK_MASK) ^ ELIXIR_FLASK_MASK;
3928 
3929  // get all available elixirs by mask and spell level
3930  std::vector<uint32> elixirs;
3931  SpellElixirMap const& m_spellElixirs = sSpellMgr.GetSpellElixirMap();
3932  for (SpellElixirMap::const_iterator itr = m_spellElixirs.begin(); itr != m_spellElixirs.end(); ++itr)
3933  {
3934  if (itr->second & elixir_mask)
3935  {
3936  if (itr->second & (ELIXIR_UNSTABLE_MASK | ELIXIR_SHATTRATH_MASK))
3937  continue;
3938 
3939  SpellEntry const* spellInfo = sSpellTemplate.LookupEntry<SpellEntry>(itr->first);
3940  if (spellInfo && (spellInfo->spellLevel < m_spellInfo->spellLevel || spellInfo->spellLevel > unitTarget->GetLevel()))
3941  continue;
3942 
3943  elixirs.push_back(itr->first);
3944  }
3945  }
3946 
3947  if (!elixirs.empty())
3948  {
3949  // cast random elixir on target
3950  uint32 rand_spell = urand(0, elixirs.size() - 1);
3951  m_caster->CastSpell(unitTarget, elixirs[rand_spell], TRIGGERED_OLD_TRIGGERED, m_CastItem);
3952  }
3953  }
3954 }
3955 
3956 void Spell::EffectEnergisePct(SpellEffectIndex eff_idx)
3957 {
3958  if (!unitTarget)
3959  return;
3960  if (!unitTarget->IsAlive())
3961  return;
3962 
3963  if (m_spellInfo->EffectMiscValue[eff_idx] < 0 || m_spellInfo->EffectMiscValue[eff_idx] >= MAX_POWERS)
3964  return;
3965 
3966  Powers power = Powers(m_spellInfo->EffectMiscValue[eff_idx]);
3967 
3968  uint32 maxPower = unitTarget->GetMaxPower(power);
3969  if (maxPower == 0)
3970  return;
3971 
3972  uint32 gain = damage * maxPower / 100;
3973  m_caster->EnergizeBySpell(unitTarget, m_spellInfo, gain, power);
3974 }
3975 
3976 void Spell::SendLoot(ObjectGuid guid, LootType loottype, LockType lockType)
3977 {
3978  switch (guid.GetHigh())
3979  {
3980  case HIGHGUID_GAMEOBJECT:
3981  {
3982  if (gameObjTarget)
3983  {
3984  switch (gameObjTarget->GetGoType())
3985  {
3986  case GAMEOBJECT_TYPE_DOOR:
3987  case GAMEOBJECT_TYPE_BUTTON:
3988  case GAMEOBJECT_TYPE_QUESTGIVER:
3989  case GAMEOBJECT_TYPE_SPELL_FOCUS:
3990  case GAMEOBJECT_TYPE_GOOBER:
3991  case GAMEOBJECT_TYPE_FLAGSTAND:
3992  gameObjTarget->Use(m_caster);
3993  return;
3994 
3995  case GAMEOBJECT_TYPE_CHEST:
3996  gameObjTarget->Use(m_caster);
3997  // Don't return, let loots been taken
3998  break;
3999 
4000  case GAMEOBJECT_TYPE_TRAP:
4001  switch (lockType)
4002  {
4003  case LOCKTYPE_NONE:
4004  case LOCKTYPE_DISARM_TRAP:
4005  case LOCKTYPE_OPEN_ATTACKING:
4006  gameObjTarget->SetLootState(GO_ACTIVATED);
4007  return;
4008  default:
4009  sLog.outError("Spell::SendLoot unhandled locktype %u for GameObject trap (entry %u) for spell %u.", lockType, gameObjTarget->GetEntry(), m_spellInfo->Id);
4010  return;
4011  }
4012  default:
4013  sLog.outError("Spell::SendLoot unhandled GameObject type %u (entry %u) for spell %u.", gameObjTarget->GetGoType(), gameObjTarget->GetEntry(), m_spellInfo->Id);
4014  return;
4015  }
4016 
4017  if (m_caster->GetTypeId() != TYPEID_PLAYER)
4018  return;
4019 
4020  Loot*& loot = gameObjTarget->m_loot;
4021  if (!loot)
4022  {
4023  loot = new Loot((Player*)m_caster, gameObjTarget, loottype);
4024  TakeCastItem();
4025  }
4026  loot->ShowContentTo((Player*)m_caster);
4027  return;
4028  }
4029  break;
4030  }
4031 
4032  case HIGHGUID_ITEM:
4033  {
4034  if (itemTarget)
4035  {
4036  Loot*& loot = itemTarget->m_loot;
4037  if (!loot)
4038  {
4039  loot = new Loot((Player*)m_caster, itemTarget, loottype);
4040  TakeCastItem();
4041  }
4042  loot->ShowContentTo((Player*)m_caster);
4043  return;
4044  }
4045 
4046  break;
4047  }
4048  default:
4049  sLog.outError("Spell::SendLoot unhandled Object type %s for spell %u.", guid.GetString().c_str(), m_spellInfo->Id);
4050  break;
4051  }
4052 }
4053 
4054 void Spell::EffectOpenLock(SpellEffectIndex eff_idx)
4055 {
4056  if (!m_caster || m_caster->GetTypeId() != TYPEID_PLAYER)
4057  {
4058  DEBUG_LOG("WORLD: Open Lock - No Player Caster!");
4059  return;
4060  }
4061 
4062  Player* player = (Player*)m_caster;
4063 
4064  uint32 lockId;
4065 
4066  // Get lockId
4067  if (gameObjTarget)
4068  {
4069  lockId = gameObjTarget->GetGOInfo()->GetLockId();
4070  }
4071  else if (itemTarget)
4072  {
4073  lockId = itemTarget->GetProto()->LockID;
4074  }
4075  else
4076  {
4077  DEBUG_LOG("WORLD: Open Lock - No GameObject/Item Target!");
4078  return;
4079  }
4080 
4081  // not allow use skill grow at item base open
4082  if (m_effectSkillInfo[eff_idx].skillId != SKILL_NONE)
4083  {
4084  // update skill if really known
4085  if (uint32 pureSkillValue = player->GetSkillValuePure(m_effectSkillInfo[eff_idx].skillId))
4086  {
4087  if (gameObjTarget && !gameObjTarget->m_loot)
4088  {
4089  // Allow one skill-up until respawned
4090  if (!gameObjTarget->IsInSkillupList(player))
4091  {
4092  player->UpdateGatherSkill(m_effectSkillInfo[eff_idx].skillId, pureSkillValue, m_effectSkillInfo[eff_idx].reqSkillValue);
4093  gameObjTarget->AddToSkillupList(player);
4094  }
4095  }
4096  else if (itemTarget && !itemTarget->m_loot)
4097  {
4098  // Do one skill-up
4099  player->UpdateGatherSkill(m_effectSkillInfo[eff_idx].skillId, pureSkillValue, m_effectSkillInfo[eff_idx].reqSkillValue);
4100  }
4101  }
4102  }
4103 
4104  // mark item as unlocked
4105  if (itemTarget)
4106  {
4107  itemTarget->SetFlag(ITEM_FIELD_FLAGS, ITEM_DYNFLAG_UNLOCKED);
4108 
4109  // only send loot if owner is player, else client sends release anyway
4110  if (itemTarget->GetOwnerGuid() == m_caster->GetObjectGuid())
4111  {
4112  SendLoot(itemTarget->GetObjectGuid(), LOOT_SKINNING, LockType(m_spellInfo->EffectMiscValue[eff_idx]));
4113  m_spellLog.AddLog(uint32(SPELL_EFFECT_OPEN_LOCK), itemTarget->GetPackGUID());
4114  }
4115  }
4116  else
4117  {
4118  SendLoot(gameObjTarget->GetObjectGuid(), LOOT_SKINNING, LockType(m_spellInfo->EffectMiscValue[eff_idx]));
4119  m_spellLog.AddLog(uint32(SPELL_EFFECT_OPEN_LOCK), gameObjTarget->GetPackGUID());
4120  }
4121 }
4122 
4123 void Spell::EffectSummonChangeItem(SpellEffectIndex eff_idx)
4124 {
4125  if (m_caster->GetTypeId() != TYPEID_PLAYER)
4126  return;
4127 
4128  Player* player = (Player*)m_caster;
4129 
4130  // applied only to using item
4131  if (!m_CastItem)
4132  return;
4133 
4134  // ... only to item in own inventory/bank/equip_slot
4135  if (m_CastItem->GetOwnerGuid() != player->GetObjectGuid())
4136  return;
4137 
4138  uint32 newitemid = m_spellInfo->EffectItemType[eff_idx];
4139  if (!newitemid)
4140  return;
4141 
4142  Item* oldItem = m_CastItem;
4143 
4144  if (m_CastItem)
4145  m_CastItem->SetUsedInSpell(false);
4146  // prevent crash at access and unexpected charges counting with item update queue corrupt
4147  ClearCastItem();
4148 
4149  uint32 curItemCount = player->GetItemCount(newitemid, true);
4150 
4151  if (Item* newItem = player->ConvertItem(oldItem, newitemid))
4152  {
4153  player->ItemAddedQuestCheck(newItem->GetEntry(), newItem->GetCount());
4154 
4155  // Push packet to client so it knows we've created an item and quest can show objective update
4156  player->SendNewItem(newItem, newItem->GetCount() - curItemCount, true, false);
4157  }
4158 }
4159 
4160 void Spell::EffectProficiency(SpellEffectIndex /*eff_idx*/)
4161 {
4162  if (m_caster->GetTypeId() != TYPEID_PLAYER)
4163  return;
4164  Player* player = static_cast<Player*>(m_caster);
4165 
4166  uint32 subClassMask = m_spellInfo->EquippedItemSubClassMask;
4167  if (m_spellInfo->EquippedItemClass == ITEM_CLASS_WEAPON && !(player->GetWeaponProficiency() & subClassMask))
4168  {
4169  player->AddWeaponProficiency(subClassMask);
4170  player->SendProficiency(ITEM_CLASS_WEAPON, player->GetWeaponProficiency());
4171  }
4172  if (m_spellInfo->EquippedItemClass == ITEM_CLASS_ARMOR && !(player->GetArmorProficiency() & subClassMask))
4173  {
4174  player->AddArmorProficiency(subClassMask);
4175  player->SendProficiency(ITEM_CLASS_ARMOR, player->GetArmorProficiency());
4176  }
4177 }
4178 
4179 void Spell::EffectApplyAreaAura(SpellEffectIndex eff_idx)
4180 {
4181  if (!unitTarget)
4182  return;
4183  if (!unitTarget->IsAlive())
4184  return;
4185 
4186  Aura* aura = CreateAura(m_spellInfo, eff_idx, &damage, &m_currentBasePoints[eff_idx], m_spellAuraHolder, unitTarget, m_caster, m_CastItem, GetScriptValue());
4187  m_spellAuraHolder->AddAura(aura, eff_idx);
4188 }
4189 
4190 void Spell::EffectSummonType(SpellEffectIndex eff_idx)
4191 {
4192  uint32 prop_id = m_spellInfo->EffectMiscValueB[eff_idx];
4193  SummonPropertiesEntry const* summon_prop = sSummonPropertiesStore.LookupEntry(prop_id);
4194  if (!summon_prop)
4195  {
4196  sLog.outError("EffectSummonType: Unhandled summon type %u", prop_id);
4197  return;
4198  }
4199 
4200  // Get casting object
4201  WorldObject* realCaster = GetCastingObject();
4202  if (!realCaster)
4203  {
4204  sLog.outError("EffectSummonType: No Casting Object found for spell %u, (caster = %s)", m_spellInfo->Id, m_caster->GetGuidStr().c_str());
4205  return;
4206  }
4207 
4208  Unit* responsibleCaster = m_originalCaster;
4209  if (realCaster->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_GAMEOBJECT)
4210  responsibleCaster = ((GameObject*)realCaster)->GetOwner();
4211 
4212  // Expected Amount: TODO - there are quite some exceptions (like totems, engineering dragonlings..)
4213  uint32 amount = 1;
4214  uint32 health = 0; // totems have HP in base points
4215  uint32 unk = 0; // no idea what it means, but 4000-25000 cant be right for summon count
4216  if (prop_id == 121 || summon_prop->Title == UNITNAME_SUMMON_TITLE_TOTEM)
4217  {
4218  health = damage;
4219  }
4220  else
4221  {
4222  switch (summon_prop->Group)
4223  {
4224  case SUMMON_PROP_GROUP_CONTROLLABLE:
4225  unk = damage;
4226  break;
4227  default:
4228  amount = damage > 0 ? damage : 1; // old code
4229  break;
4230  }
4231  }
4232 
4233  // Expected Level
4234  WorldObject* petInvoker = responsibleCaster ? responsibleCaster : m_trueCaster;
4235  uint32 level;
4236  // Everything considered as guardian or critter pets uses its creature template level by default (may change depending on SpellEffect params)
4237  if (summon_prop->Title == UNITNAME_SUMMON_TITLE_COMPANION)
4238  {
4239  if (CreatureInfo const* cInfo = ObjectMgr::GetCreatureTemplate(m_spellInfo->EffectMiscValue[eff_idx]))
4240  level = urand(cInfo->MinLevel, cInfo->MaxLevel);
4241  else
4242  {
4243  sLog.outError("Spell Effect EFFECT_SUMMON (%u) - no creature template found for summoned NPC %u (spell id %u, effIndex %u)", m_spellInfo->Effect[eff_idx], m_spellInfo->EffectMiscValue[eff_idx], m_spellInfo->Id, eff_idx);
4244  return;
4245  }
4246  }
4247  else // Use invoker level in all other cases (to be confirmed)
4248  {
4249  if (CreatureInfo const* cInfo = ObjectMgr::GetCreatureTemplate(m_spellInfo->EffectMiscValue[eff_idx]))
4250  level = std::max(std::min(petInvoker->GetLevel(), cInfo->MaxLevel), cInfo->MinLevel);
4251  else
4252  {
4253  sLog.outError("Spell Effect EFFECT_SUMMON (%u) - no creature template found for summoned NPC %u (spell id %u, effIndex %u)", m_spellInfo->Effect[eff_idx], m_spellInfo->EffectMiscValue[eff_idx], m_spellInfo->Id, eff_idx);
4254  return;
4255  }
4256  }
4257  if (!petInvoker->IsPlayer())
4258  {
4259  // If EffectMultipleValue <= 0, pets have their calculated level modified by EffectMultipleValue
4260  if (m_spellInfo->EffectMultipleValue[eff_idx] <= 0) // TODO: Check if instead of using level variable, should not use 0 in this check
4261  {
4262  uint32 resultLevel = std::max(level + m_spellInfo->EffectMultipleValue[eff_idx], 0.0f);
4263 
4264  // Result level should be a valid level for creatures
4265  if (resultLevel > 0 && resultLevel <= DEFAULT_MAX_CREATURE_LEVEL)
4266  level = resultLevel;
4267  }
4268  }
4269  // level of creature summoned using engineering item based at engineering skill level
4270  else if (m_CastItem)
4271  {
4272  ItemPrototype const* proto = m_CastItem->GetProto();
4273  if (proto && proto->RequiredSkill == SKILL_ENGINEERING && proto->InventoryType == INVTYPE_TRINKET)
4274  {
4275  if (uint16 engineeringSkill = ((Player*)m_caster)->GetSkillValue(SKILL_ENGINEERING))
4276  {
4277  level = engineeringSkill / 5;
4278  amount = 1; // TODO HACK (needs a neat way of doing)
4279  // in TBC max levels are clamped
4280  if (CreatureInfo const* cInfo = ObjectMgr::GetCreatureTemplate(m_spellInfo->EffectMiscValue[eff_idx]))
4281  level = std::min(cInfo->MaxLevel, level);
4282  }
4283  }
4284  // other cases are covered above by using level from template
4285  }
4286 
4287  CreatureSummonPositions summonPositions;
4288  summonPositions.resize(amount, CreaturePosition());
4289 
4290  // Set middle position
4291  if (m_targets.m_targetMask & TARGET_FLAG_DEST_LOCATION)
4292  m_targets.getDestination(summonPositions[0].x, summonPositions[0].y, summonPositions[0].z);
4293  else
4294  {
4295  realCaster->GetPosition(summonPositions[0].x, summonPositions[0].y, summonPositions[0].z);
4296  // TODO - Is this really an error?
4297  sLog.outDebug("Spell Effect EFFECT_SUMMON (%u) - summon without destination (spell id %u, effIndex %u)", m_spellInfo->Effect[eff_idx], m_spellInfo->Id, eff_idx);
4298  }
4299 
4300  // Set summon positions
4301  float radius = GetSpellRadius(sSpellRadiusStore.LookupEntry(m_spellInfo->EffectRadiusIndex[eff_idx]));
4302  CreatureSummonPositions::iterator itr = summonPositions.begin();
4303  for (++itr; itr != summonPositions.end(); ++itr) // In case of multiple summons around position for not-fist positions
4304  {
4305  if (m_targets.m_targetMask & TARGET_FLAG_DEST_LOCATION || radius > 1.0f)
4306  {
4307  realCaster->GetRandomPoint(summonPositions[0].x, summonPositions[0].y, summonPositions[0].z, radius, itr->x, itr->y, itr->z);
4308  if (realCaster->GetMap()->GetHitPosition(summonPositions[0].x, summonPositions[0].y, summonPositions[0].z, itr->x, itr->y, itr->z, -0.5f))
4309  realCaster->UpdateAllowedPositionZ(itr->x, itr->y, itr->z);
4310  }
4311  else // Get a point near the caster
4312  {
4313  realCaster->GetClosePoint(itr->x, itr->y, itr->z, 0.0f, radius, frand(0.0f, 2 * M_PI_F));
4314  if (realCaster->GetMap()->GetHitPosition(summonPositions[0].x, summonPositions[0].y, summonPositions[0].z, itr->x, itr->y, itr->z, -0.5f))
4315  realCaster->UpdateAllowedPositionZ(itr->x, itr->y, itr->z);
4316  }
4317  }
4318 
4319  bool summonResult = false;
4320  switch (summon_prop->Group)
4321  {
4322  // faction handled later on, or loaded from template
4323  case SUMMON_PROP_GROUP_WILD:
4324  case SUMMON_PROP_GROUP_FRIENDLY:
4325  {
4326  switch (summon_prop->Title) // better from known way sorting summons by AI types
4327  {
4328  case UNITNAME_SUMMON_TITLE_NONE:
4329  {
4330  // those are classical totems - effectbasepoints is their hp and not summon ammount!
4331  // 121: 23035, battlestands
4332  // 647: 52893, Anti-Magic Zone (npc used)
4333  if (prop_id == 121 || prop_id == 647)
4334  summonResult = DoSummonTotem(summonPositions, eff_idx);
4335  else
4336  {
4337  switch (m_spellInfo->Id) // unable to distinguish based on prop_id, therefore spell by spell override
4338  {
4339  case 38544: // summon marmot, gives control of marmot pet
4340  summonResult = DoSummonPossessed(summonPositions, summon_prop, eff_idx, level);
4341  break;
4342  default:
4343  summonResult = DoSummonWild(summonPositions, summon_prop, eff_idx, level);
4344  break;
4345  }
4346  }
4347  break;
4348  }
4349  case UNITNAME_SUMMON_TITLE_PET:
4350  summonResult = DoSummonGuardian(summonPositions, summon_prop, eff_idx, level);
4351  break;
4352  case UNITNAME_SUMMON_TITLE_GUARDIAN:
4353  {
4354  if (prop_id == 61)
4355  {
4356  if (CreatureInfo const* cInfo = ObjectMgr::GetCreatureTemplate(m_spellInfo->EffectMiscValue[eff_idx]))
4357  {
4358  // Totem cases
4359  if (cInfo->CreatureType == CREATURE_TYPE_TOTEM)
4360  {
4361  summonResult = DoSummonTotem(summonPositions, eff_idx);
4362  break;
4363  }
4364  }
4365  else
4366  return;
4367  }
4368 
4369  summonResult = DoSummonGuardian(summonPositions, summon_prop, eff_idx, level);
4370  break;
4371  }
4372  case UNITNAME_SUMMON_TITLE_TOTEM:
4373  summonResult = DoSummonTotem(summonPositions, eff_idx, summon_prop->Slot);
4374  break;
4375  case UNITNAME_SUMMON_TITLE_COMPANION:
4376  // slot 6 set for critters that can help to player in fighting
4377  if (summon_prop->Slot == SUMMON_PROP_SLOT_QUEST_PLAYERS_ONLY)
4378  summonResult = DoSummonGuardian(summonPositions, summon_prop, eff_idx, level);
4379  else
4380  summonResult = DoSummonCritter(summonPositions, summon_prop, eff_idx, level);
4381  break;
4382  default:
4383  sLog.outError("EffectSummonType: Unhandled summon title %u", summon_prop->Title);
4384  break;
4385  }
4386  break;
4387  }
4388  case SUMMON_PROP_GROUP_PETS:
4389  {
4390  // 1562 - force of nature - sid 33831
4391  // 1161 - feral spirit - sid 51533
4392  if (prop_id == 1562) // 3 uncontrolable instead of one controllable :/
4393  summonResult = DoSummonGuardian(summonPositions, summon_prop, eff_idx, level);
4394  else
4395  summonResult = DoSummonPet(summonPositions, summon_prop, eff_idx);
4396  break;
4397  }
4398  case SUMMON_PROP_GROUP_CONTROLLABLE:
4399  {
4400  summonResult = DoSummonPossessed(summonPositions, summon_prop, eff_idx, level);
4401  break;
4402  }
4403  default:
4404  sLog.outError("EffectSummonType: Unhandled summon group type %u", summon_prop->Group);
4405  break;
4406  }
4407 
4408  if (!summonResult)
4409  return; // No further handling required
4410 
4411  Creature* caster = nullptr;
4412  if (m_originalCaster)
4413  {
4414  if (m_originalCaster->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_UNIT)
4415  caster = static_cast<Creature*>(m_originalCaster);
4416  }
4417  else if (m_trueCaster && m_trueCaster->IsCreature())
4418  caster = static_cast<Creature*>(m_trueCaster);
4419 
4420  for (itr = summonPositions.begin(); itr != summonPositions.end(); ++itr)
4421  {
4422  Creature* creature = itr->creature;
4423  MANGOS_ASSERT(creature || itr != summonPositions.begin());
4424  if (!creature)
4425  {
4426  sLog.outError("EffectSummonType: Expected to have %u NPCs summoned, but some failed (Spell id %u)", amount, m_spellInfo->Id);
4427  continue;
4428  }
4429 
4430  if (summon_prop->FactionId)
4431  itr->creature->setFaction(summon_prop->FactionId);
4432 
4433  if (!itr->processed)
4434  {
4435  m_trueCaster->GetMap()->Add(creature);
4436 
4437  creature->AIM_Initialize();
4438 
4439  // Notify original caster if not done already
4440  if (caster && caster->AI())
4441  caster->AI()->JustSummoned(creature);
4442  }
4443  else if (m_originalCaster && m_originalCaster != m_trueCaster && m_originalCaster->AI())
4444  {
4445  // original caster is provided by script so we have to notify it as its not done in Object::SummonCreature
4446  m_originalCaster->AI()->JustSummoned(creature);
4447  }
4448 
4449  OnSummon(creature);
4450 
4451  m_spellLog.AddLog(uint32(SPELL_EFFECT_SUMMON), creature->GetPackGUID());
4452 
4453  if (summon_prop->Flags & SUMMON_PROP_FLAG_ATTACK_SUMMONER && m_caster)
4454  if (m_caster->CanEnterCombat() && creature->CanEnterCombat() && creature->CanAttack(m_caster))
4455  creature->AI()->AttackStart(m_caster);
4456 
4457  if (summon_prop->Flags & SUMMON_PROP_FLAG_HELP_WHEN_SUMMONED_IN_COMBAT && m_caster)
4458  {
4459  if (m_caster->CanEnterCombat() && creature->CanEnterCombat() && creature->CanAssist(m_caster))
4460  {
4461  if (!m_caster->CanHaveThreatList())
4462  {
4463  for (auto& ref : m_caster->getHostileRefManager())
4464  if (Unit* victim = ref.getSource()->getOwner())
4465  if (creature->CanAttack(victim))
4466  creature->AddThreat(victim);
4467  }
4468  else
4469  {
4470  for (auto ref : m_caster->getThreatManager().getThreatList())
4471  if (Unit* victim = ref->getTarget())
4472  if (creature->CanAttack(victim))
4473  creature->AddThreat(victim);
4474  }
4475 
4476  if (!creature->getThreatManager().isThreatListEmpty())
4477  creature->AI()->AttackClosestEnemy();
4478  }
4479  }
4480  }
4481 }
4482 
4483 bool Spell::DoSummonPet(CreatureSummonPositions& list, SummonPropertiesEntry const* prop, SpellEffectIndex effIdx)
4484 {
4485  MANGOS_ASSERT(!list.empty() && prop);
4486 
4487  if (m_caster->GetPetGuid())
4488  return false;
4489 
4490  uint32 pet_entry = m_spellInfo->EffectMiscValue[effIdx];
4491  if (!pet_entry)
4492  return false;
4493 
4494  Pet* spawnCreature = new Pet();
4495 
4496  Player* _player = nullptr;
4497 
4498  Position spawnPos(list[0].x, list[0].y, list[0].z, m_caster->GetOrientation());
4499 
4500  if (m_caster->IsPlayer())
4501  {
4502  _player = static_cast<Player*>(m_caster);
4503 
4504  // Load pet from db; if any to load
4505  if (m_caster->getClass() != CLASS_PRIEST
4506  && spawnCreature->LoadPetFromDB(_player, spawnPos, pet_entry))
4507  {
4508  spawnCreature->SetHealth(spawnCreature->GetMaxHealth());
4509  spawnCreature->SetPower(POWER_MANA, spawnCreature->GetMaxPower(POWER_MANA));
4510 
4511  // set timer for unsummon
4512  if (m_duration > 0)
4513  spawnCreature->SetDuration(m_duration);
4514 
4515  spawnCreature->SavePetToDB(PET_SAVE_AS_CURRENT, _player);
4516  list[0].creature = spawnCreature;
4517  return true;
4518  }
4519  }
4520 
4521  spawnCreature->setPetType(SUMMON_PET);
4522 
4523  CreatureInfo const* cInfo = ObjectMgr::GetCreatureTemplate(pet_entry);
4524  if (!cInfo)
4525  {
4526  sLog.outErrorDb("Spell::DoSummon: creature entry %u not found for spell %u.", pet_entry, m_spellInfo->Id);
4527  delete spawnCreature;
4528  return false;
4529  }
4530 
4531  // Summon in dest location
4532  CreatureCreatePos pos(m_caster->GetMap(), spawnPos.x, spawnPos.y, spawnPos.z, spawnPos.o);
4533 
4534  if (!(m_targets.m_targetMask & TARGET_FLAG_DEST_LOCATION))
4535  {
4536  float px, py, pz;
4537  m_caster->GetClosePoint(px, py, pz, 2.0f);
4538  pos = CreatureCreatePos(m_caster->GetMap(), px, py, pz, -m_caster->GetOrientation());
4539  }
4540 
4541  Map* map = m_caster->GetMap();
4542  uint32 pet_number = sObjectMgr.GeneratePetNumber();
4543  if (!spawnCreature->Create(map->GenerateLocalLowGuid(HIGHGUID_PET), pos, cInfo, pet_number))
4544  {
4545  sLog.outErrorDb("Spell::EffectSummon: can't create creature with entry %u for spell %u", cInfo->Entry, m_spellInfo->Id);
4546  delete spawnCreature;
4547  return false;
4548  }
4549 
4550  spawnCreature->SetLoading(true);
4551 
4552  // Level of pet summoned
4553  uint32 level = std::max(m_caster->GetLevel() + m_spellInfo->EffectMultipleValue[effIdx], 1.0f);
4554 
4555  spawnCreature->SetRespawnCoord(pos);
4556 
4557  // set timer for unsummon
4558  if (m_duration > 0)
4559  spawnCreature->SetDuration(m_duration);
4560 
4561  spawnCreature->SetOwnerGuid(m_caster->GetObjectGuid());
4562  spawnCreature->SetUInt32Value(UNIT_FIELD_FLAGS, cInfo->UnitFlags);
4563  spawnCreature->SetUInt32Value(UNIT_NPC_FLAGS, cInfo->NpcFlags);
4564  spawnCreature->setFaction(m_caster->GetFaction());
4565  spawnCreature->SetUInt32Value(UNIT_FIELD_PET_NAME_TIMESTAMP, 0);
4566  spawnCreature->SetUInt32Value(UNIT_CREATED_BY_SPELL, m_spellInfo->Id);
4567 
4568  spawnCreature->SetCanModifyStats(true);
4569  spawnCreature->InitStatsForLevel(level);
4570 
4571  if (CharmInfo* charmInfo = spawnCreature->GetCharmInfo())
4572  charmInfo->SetPetNumber(pet_number, (m_caster->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_PLAYER && spawnCreature->isControlled()));
4573 
4574  // spawnCreature->SetName(""); // generated by client
4575 
4576  if (m_caster->HasFlag(UNIT_FIELD_FLAGS, UNIT_FLAG_PLAYER_CONTROLLED))
4577  {
4578  spawnCreature->SetFlag(UNIT_FIELD_FLAGS, UNIT_FLAG_PLAYER_CONTROLLED);
4579  spawnCreature->SetByteValue(UNIT_FIELD_BYTES_2, UNIT_BYTES_2_OFFSET_DEBUFF_LIMIT, UNIT_BYTE2_PLAYER_CONTROLLED_DEBUFF_LIMIT);
4580  }
4581  else
4582  spawnCreature->SetByteValue(UNIT_FIELD_BYTES_2, UNIT_BYTES_2_OFFSET_DEBUFF_LIMIT, UNIT_BYTE2_CREATURE_DEBUFF_LIMIT);
4583 
4584  m_caster->SetPet(spawnCreature);
4585 
4586  if (m_caster->IsImmuneToNPC())
4587  spawnCreature->SetImmuneToNPC(true);
4588 
4589  if (m_caster->IsImmuneToPlayer())
4590  spawnCreature->SetImmuneToPlayer(true);
4591 
4592  if (m_caster->IsPvP())
4593  spawnCreature->SetPvP(true);
4594 
4595  map->Add((Creature*)spawnCreature);
4596  spawnCreature->AIM_Initialize();
4597  spawnCreature->AI()->SetReactState(REACT_DEFENSIVE);
4598  spawnCreature->InitPetCreateSpells();
4599 
4600  if (_player)
4601  {
4602  _player->PetSpellInitialize();
4603  if (m_caster->getClass() != CLASS_PRIEST)
4604  spawnCreature->SavePetToDB(PET_SAVE_AS_CURRENT, _player);
4605  }
4606  spawnCreature->SetLoading(false);
4607 
4608  // Notify original caster if not done already
4609  if (m_caster->AI())
4610  m_caster->AI()->JustSummoned(spawnCreature);
4611 
4612  list[0].creature = spawnCreature;
4613  list[0].processed = true;
4614  return true;
4615 }
4616 
4617 void Spell::EffectLearnSpell(SpellEffectIndex eff_idx)
4618 {
4619  if (!unitTarget)
4620  return;
4621 
4622  if (unitTarget->GetTypeId() != TYPEID_PLAYER)
4623  {
4624  if (m_caster->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_PLAYER)
4625  EffectLearnPetSpell(eff_idx);
4626 
4627  return;
4628  }
4629 
4630  Player* player = (Player*)unitTarget;
4631 
4632  uint32 spellToLearn = (m_spellInfo->Id == SPELL_ID_GENERIC_LEARN) ? damage : m_spellInfo->EffectTriggerSpell[eff_idx];
4633  player->learnSpell(spellToLearn, false);
4634 
4635  if (WorldObject const* caster = GetCastingObject())
4636  DEBUG_LOG("Spell: %s has learned spell %u from %s", player->GetGuidStr().c_str(), spellToLearn, caster->GetGuidStr().c_str());
4637 }
4638 
4639 void Spell::EffectDispel(SpellEffectIndex eff_idx)
4640 {
4641  if (!unitTarget)
4642  return;
4643 
4644  // Fill possible dispel list
4645  std::list <std::pair<SpellAuraHolder*, uint32> > dispelList;
4646 
4647  // Create dispel mask by dispel type
4648  uint32 dispelMask = GetDispellMask(DispelType(m_spellInfo->EffectMiscValue[eff_idx]));
4649  Unit::SpellAuraHolderMap const& auras = unitTarget->GetSpellAuraHolderMap();
4650  for (Unit::SpellAuraHolderMap::const_iterator itr = auras.begin(); itr != auras.end(); ++itr)
4651  {
4652  SpellAuraHolder* holder = itr->second;
4653  if (holder->IsDispellableByMask(dispelMask, m_caster, m_spellInfo))
4654  dispelList.push_back(std::pair<SpellAuraHolder*, uint32>(holder, holder->GetStackAmount()));
4655  }
4656  std::list<std::pair<SpellAuraHolder*, uint32> > successList;
4657  std::list <uint32> failList;
4658  ProcessDispelList(dispelList, successList, failList);
4659  EvaluateResultLists(successList, failList);
4660 }
4661 
4662 void Spell::EffectDispelMechanic(SpellEffectIndex eff_idx)
4663 {
4664  if (!unitTarget)
4665  return;
4666 
4667  uint32 mechanic = m_spellInfo->EffectMiscValue[eff_idx];
4668 
4669  // Fill possible dispel list
4670  std::list <std::pair<SpellAuraHolder*, uint32> > dispelList;
4671 
4672  Unit::SpellAuraHolderMap& Auras = unitTarget->GetSpellAuraHolderMap();
4673  for (Unit::SpellAuraHolderMap::iterator iter = Auras.begin(); iter != Auras.end(); ++iter)
4674  if (iter->second->HasMechanic(mechanic))
4675  dispelList.push_back(std::pair<SpellAuraHolder*, uint32>(iter->second, iter->second->GetStackAmount()));
4676  std::list<std::pair<SpellAuraHolder*, uint32> > successList;
4677  std::list <uint32> failList;
4678  ProcessDispelList(dispelList, successList, failList);
4679  EvaluateResultLists(successList, failList);
4680 }
4681 
4682 void Spell::ProcessDispelList(std::list <std::pair<SpellAuraHolder*, uint32> >& dispelList, std::list<std::pair<SpellAuraHolder*, uint32> >& successList, std::list <uint32>& failList)
4683 {
4684  // Ok if exist some buffs for dispel try dispel it
4685  if (!dispelList.empty())
4686  {
4687  // some spells have effect value = 0 and all from its by meaning expect 1
4688  if (!damage)
4689  damage = 1;
4690 
4691  // Dispel N = damage buffs (or while exist buffs for dispel)
4692  for (int32 count = 0; count < damage && !dispelList.empty(); ++count)
4693  {
4694  // Random select buff for dispel
4695  std::list<std::pair<SpellAuraHolder*, uint32> >::iterator dispel_itr = dispelList.begin();
4696  std::advance(dispel_itr, urand(0, dispelList.size() - 1));
4697 
4698  SpellAuraHolder* holder = dispel_itr->first;
4699 
4700  dispel_itr->second -= 1;
4701 
4702  // remove entry from dispel_list if nothing left in stack
4703  if (dispel_itr->second == 0)
4704  dispelList.erase(dispel_itr);
4705 
4706  SpellEntry const* spellInfo = holder->GetSpellProto();
4707  // Base dispel chance
4708  // TODO: possible chance depend from spell level??
4709  int32 miss_chance = 0;
4710  // Apply dispel mod from aura caster
4711  if (Unit* caster = holder->GetCaster())
4712  {
4713  if (Player* modOwner = caster->GetSpellModOwner())
4714  modOwner->ApplySpellMod(spellInfo->Id, SPELLMOD_RESIST_DISPEL_CHANCE, miss_chance);
4715  miss_chance += caster->GetTotalAuraModifier(SPELL_AURA_MOD_DISPEL_RESIST);
4716  }
4717  // Try dispel
4718  if (roll_chance_i(miss_chance))
4719  failList.push_back(spellInfo->Id);
4720  else
4721  {
4722  bool foundDispelled = false;
4723  for (std::list<std::pair<SpellAuraHolder*, uint32> >::iterator success_iter = successList.begin(); success_iter != successList.end(); ++success_iter)
4724  {
4725  if (success_iter->first->GetId() == holder->GetId() && success_iter->first->GetCasterGuid() == holder->GetCasterGuid())
4726  {
4727  success_iter->second += 1;
4728  foundDispelled = true;
4729  break;
4730  }
4731  }
4732  if (!foundDispelled)
4733  successList.push_back(std::pair<SpellAuraHolder*, uint32>(holder, 1));
4734  }
4735  }
4736  }
4737 }
4738 
4739 void Spell::EvaluateResultLists(std::list<std::pair<SpellAuraHolder*, uint32> >& successList, std::list <uint32>& failList)
4740 {
4741  // Send success log and really remove auras
4742  if (!successList.empty())
4743  {
4744  int32 count = successList.size();
4745  WorldPacket data(SMSG_SPELLDISPELLOG, 8 + 8 + 4 + 1 + 4 + count * 5);
4746  data << unitTarget->GetPackGUID(); // Victim GUID
4747  data << m_caster->GetPackGUID(); // Caster GUID
4748  data << uint32(m_spellInfo->Id); // Dispel spell id
4749  data << uint8(0); // not used
4750  data << uint32(count); // count
4751  for (std::list<std::pair<SpellAuraHolder*, uint32> >::iterator j = successList.begin(); j != successList.end(); ++j)
4752  {
4753  SpellAuraHolder* dispelledHolder = j->first;
4754  data << uint32(dispelledHolder->GetId()); // Spell Id
4755  data << uint8(0); // 0 - dispelled !=0 cleansed
4756  unitTarget->RemoveAuraHolderDueToSpellByDispel(dispelledHolder->GetId(), m_spellInfo->Id, j->second, dispelledHolder->GetCasterGuid(), m_caster);
4757  }
4758  m_caster->SendMessageToSet(data, true);
4759 
4760  // On success dispel
4761  // Devour Magic
4762  if (m_spellInfo->SpellFamilyName == SPELLFAMILY_WARLOCK && m_spellInfo->Category == SPELLCATEGORY_DEVOUR_MAGIC)
4763  {
4764  uint32 heal_spell = 0;
4765  switch (m_spellInfo->Id)
4766  {
4767  case 19505: heal_spell = 19658; break;
4768  case 19731: heal_spell = 19732; break;
4769  case 19734: heal_spell = 19733; break;
4770  case 19736: heal_spell = 19735; break;
4771  case 27276: heal_spell = 27278; break;
4772  case 27277: heal_spell = 27279; break;
4773  default:
4774  DEBUG_LOG("Spell for Devour Magic %d not handled in Spell::EffectDispel", m_spellInfo->Id);
4775  break;
4776  }
4777  if (heal_spell)
4778  m_caster->CastSpell(nullptr, heal_spell, TRIGGERED_OLD_TRIGGERED);
4779  }
4780  }
4781  // Send fail log to client
4782  if (!failList.empty())
4783  {
4784  // Failed to dispel
4785  WorldPacket data(SMSG_DISPEL_FAILED, 8 + 8 + 4 + 4 * failList.size());
4786  data << m_caster->GetObjectGuid(); // Caster GUID
4787  data << unitTarget->GetObjectGuid(); // Victim GUID
4788  data << uint32(m_spellInfo->Id); // Dispel spell id
4789  for (std::list< uint32 >::iterator j = failList.begin(); j != failList.end(); ++j)
4790  data << uint32(*j); // Spell Id
4791  m_caster->SendMessageToSet(data, true);
4792  }
4793 }
4794 
4795 void Spell::EffectDualWield(SpellEffectIndex /*eff_idx*/)
4796 {
4797  if (unitTarget)
4798  unitTarget->SetCanDualWield(true);
4799 }
4800 
4801 void Spell::EffectPull(SpellEffectIndex /*eff_idx*/)
4802 {
4803  // TODO: create a proper pull towards distract spell center for distract
4804  DEBUG_LOG("WORLD: Spell Effect DUMMY");
4805 }
4806 
4807 void Spell::EffectDistract(SpellEffectIndex /*eff_idx*/)
4808 {
4809  // Check for possible target
4810  if (!unitTarget || unitTarget->IsInCombat())
4811  return;
4812 
4813  // target must be OK to do this
4814  if (unitTarget->hasUnitState(UNIT_STAT_CAN_NOT_REACT))
4815  return;
4816 
4817  unitTarget->clearUnitState(UNIT_STAT_MOVING);
4818 
4819  if (unitTarget->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_UNIT)
4820  unitTarget->GetMotionMaster()->MoveDistract(damage * IN_MILLISECONDS);
4821 
4822  float orientation = unitTarget->GetAngle(m_targets.m_destPos.x, m_targets.m_destPos.y);
4823  unitTarget->SetFacingTo(orientation);
4824  // This is needed to change the facing server side as well (and it must be after the MoveDistract call)
4825  unitTarget->SetOrientation(orientation);
4826 }
4827 
4828 void Spell::EffectPickPocket(SpellEffectIndex /*eff_idx*/)
4829 {
4830  if (m_caster->GetTypeId() != TYPEID_PLAYER)
4831  return;
4832 
4833  // victim must be creature and attackable
4834  if (!unitTarget || unitTarget->GetTypeId() != TYPEID_UNIT || !m_caster->CanAttackNow(unitTarget))
4835  return;
4836 
4837  Creature* creatureTarget = static_cast<Creature*>(unitTarget);
4838  Player* playerCaster = static_cast<Player*>(m_caster);
4839 
4840  int chance = 5; //base failure chance is 5%
4841 
4842  //TODO investigate if font pickpocketing has higher failure chance then from behind
4843  //if (m_caster->IsFacingTargetsFront(unitTarget))
4844  // chance *= 4; //base chance is 20% from the front
4845 
4846  int casterLevel = int32(m_caster->GetLevel());
4847  int targetLevel = int32(unitTarget->GetLevel());
4848 
4849  //we need to increase the base chance for failure if target is higher level then caster
4850  //incremental chance to fail based on level. maximum is 97% chance if level difference is dramatic (give it 3% chance to succeed?).
4851  if (targetLevel > casterLevel)
4852  chance = int32(std::min(int32(std::floor(((targetLevel - casterLevel) * 2.0) + 0.5) * chance), 97));
4853 
4854  int result = urand() % 100;
4855 
4856  if (result >= chance)
4857  {
4858  // Stealing successful
4859  //BASIC_LOG("Successfull pickpocket result %i for chance %i", result, chance);
4860 
4861  Loot*& loot = unitTarget->m_loot;
4862  if (!loot)
4863  loot = new Loot(playerCaster, creatureTarget, LOOT_PICKPOCKETING);
4864  else
4865  {
4866  if (loot->GetLootType() == LOOT_PICKPOCKETING)
4867  {
4868  if (creatureTarget->GetLootStatus() == CREATURE_LOOT_STATUS_PICKPOCKETED)
4869  {
4870  if (creatureTarget->CanRestockPickpocketLoot())
4871  {
4872  // refill pickpocket
4873  delete loot;
4874  loot = new Loot(playerCaster, creatureTarget, LOOT_PICKPOCKETING);
4875  creatureTarget->SetLootStatus(CREATURE_LOOT_STATUS_NONE, true);
4876  }
4877  else
4878  {
4879  playerCaster->SendLootError(unitTarget->GetObjectGuid(), LOOT_ERROR_ALREADY_PICKPOCKETED);
4880  return;
4881  }
4882  } // else not fully taken
4883  }
4884  else
4885  {
4886  delete loot;
4887  loot = new Loot(playerCaster, creatureTarget, LOOT_PICKPOCKETING);
4888  }
4889  }
4890  loot->ShowContentTo(playerCaster);
4891  }
4892  else // current implementation of SPELL_ATTR_EX_FAILURE_BREAKS_STEALTH
4893  {
4894  //BASIC_LOG("Failed pickpocket result %i for chance %i", result, chance);
4895 
4896  // Reveal action + get attack
4897  m_caster->RemoveAurasWithInterruptFlags(AURA_INTERRUPT_FLAG_INTERACTING);
4898  unitTarget->AttackedBy(m_caster);
4899  }
4900 }
4901 
4902 void Spell::EffectAddFarsight(SpellEffectIndex eff_idx)
4903 {
4904  if (m_caster->GetTypeId() != TYPEID_PLAYER)
4905  return;
4906 
4907  DynamicObject* dynObj = new DynamicObject;
4908 
4909  // set radius to 0: spell not expected to work as persistent aura
4910  if (!dynObj->Create(m_caster->GetMap()->GenerateLocalLowGuid(HIGHGUID_DYNAMICOBJECT), m_caster,
4911  m_spellInfo->Id, eff_idx, m_targets.m_destPos.x, m_targets.m_destPos.y, m_targets.m_destPos.z, m_duration, 0, DYNAMIC_OBJECT_FARSIGHT_FOCUS, TARGET_NONE, damage, m_currentBasePoints[eff_idx]))
4912  {
4913  delete dynObj;
4914  return;
4915  }
4916 
4917  m_caster->AddDynObject(dynObj);
4918  m_caster->GetMap()->Add(dynObj);
4919 
4920  ((Player*)m_caster)->GetCamera().SetView(dynObj);
4921 }
4922 
4923 bool Spell::DoSummonWild(CreatureSummonPositions& list, SummonPropertiesEntry const* prop, SpellEffectIndex effIdx, uint32 level)
4924 {
4925  uint32 creature_entry = m_spellInfo->EffectMiscValue[effIdx];
4926  CreatureInfo const* cInfo = ObjectMgr::GetCreatureTemplate(creature_entry);
4927  if (!cInfo)
4928  {
4929  sLog.outErrorDb("Spell::DoSummonWild: creature entry %u not found for spell %u.", creature_entry, m_spellInfo->Id);
4930  return false;
4931  }
4932 
4933  TempSpawnType summonType = (m_duration == 0) ? TEMPSPAWN_DEAD_DESPAWN : TEMPSPAWN_TIMED_OR_DEAD_DESPAWN;
4934 
4935  Unit* summonInvoker = m_caster;
4936  if (m_trueCaster->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_GAMEOBJECT)
4937  summonInvoker = static_cast<GameObject*>(m_trueCaster)->GetOwner();
4938 
4939  for (auto& itr : list)
4940  if (Creature* summon = WorldObject::SummonCreature(TempSpawnSettings(m_trueCaster, creature_entry, itr.x, itr.y, itr.z, m_trueCaster->GetOrientation(), summonType, m_duration, false,
4941  IsSpellSetRun(m_spellInfo), 0, 0, 0, false, false, m_spellInfo->Id, -1, level), m_trueCaster->GetMap()))
4942  {
4943  itr.creature = summon;
4944  itr.processed = true;
4945 
4946  switch(m_spellInfo->Id)
4947  {
4948  case 1122: // Warlock Infernal - requires custom code - generalized in WOTLK
4949  {
4950  // Enslave demon effect, without mana cost and cooldown
4951  summon->CastSpell(nullptr, 22707, TRIGGERED_OLD_TRIGGERED); // short root spell on infernal from sniffs
4952  m_caster->CastSpell(summon, 20882, TRIGGERED_OLD_TRIGGERED);
4953  summon->CastSpell(nullptr, 22703, TRIGGERED_NONE); // Inferno effect - in wotlk cast automatically
4954  summon->AI()->DoCastSpellIfCan(nullptr, 19483, CAST_TRIGGERED | CAST_AURA_NOT_PRESENT);
4955  summon->CastSpell(nullptr, 22764, TRIGGERED_NONE); // aggro spell
4956  break;
4957  }
4958  }
4959 
4960  if (prop->Group == SUMMON_PROP_GROUP_FRIENDLY && summonInvoker) // for example 54359
4961  {
4962  if (summonInvoker->IsPlayerControlled())
4963  summon->SetFlag(UNIT_FIELD_FLAGS, UNIT_FLAG_PLAYER_CONTROLLED);
4964 
4965  summon->setFaction(summonInvoker->GetFaction());
4966  summon->SetOwnerGuid(summonInvoker->GetObjectGuid());
4967  }
4968  }
4969  else
4970  return false;
4971 
4972  return true;
4973 }
4974 
4975 bool Spell::DoSummonGuardian(CreatureSummonPositions& list, SummonPropertiesEntry const* prop, SpellEffectIndex effIdx, uint32 level)
4976 {
4977  MANGOS_ASSERT(!list.empty() && prop);
4978 
4979  uint32 pet_entry = m_spellInfo->EffectMiscValue[effIdx];
4980  CreatureInfo const* cInfo = ObjectMgr::GetCreatureTemplate(pet_entry);
4981  if (!cInfo)
4982  {
4983  sLog.outErrorDb("Spell::DoSummonGuardian: creature entry %u not found for spell %u.", pet_entry, m_spellInfo->Id);
4984  return false;
4985  }
4986 
4987  PetType petType = GUARDIAN_PET;
4988 
4989  // second direct cast unsummon guardian(s) (guardians without like functionality have cooldown > spawn time)
4990  if (!m_IsTriggeredSpell && m_caster->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_PLAYER)
4991  {
4992  bool found = false;
4993  // including protector
4994  while (Pet* old_summon = m_caster->FindGuardianWithEntry(pet_entry))
4995  {
4996  old_summon->Unsummon(PET_SAVE_AS_DELETED, m_caster);
4997  found = true;
4998  }
4999 
5000  if (found && !(m_spellInfo->DurationIndex && m_spellInfo->Category))
5001  return false;
5002  }
5003 
5004  // in another case summon new
5005  for (CreatureSummonPositions::iterator itr = list.begin(); itr != list.end(); ++itr)
5006  {
5007  Pet* spawnCreature = new Pet(petType);
5008 
5009  CreatureCreatePos pos(m_caster->GetMap(), itr->x, itr->y, itr->z, -m_caster->GetOrientation());
5010 
5011  uint32 pet_number = sObjectMgr.GeneratePetNumber();
5012  if (!spawnCreature->Create(m_caster->GetMap()->GenerateLocalLowGuid(HIGHGUID_PET), pos, cInfo, pet_number))
5013  {
5014  sLog.outError("Spell::DoSummonGuardian: can't create creature entry %u for spell %u.", pet_entry, m_spellInfo->Id);
5015  delete spawnCreature;
5016  return false;
5017  }
5018 
5019  spawnCreature->SetLoading(true);
5020 
5021  itr->creature = spawnCreature;
5022 
5023  spawnCreature->SetRespawnCoord(pos);
5024 
5025  if (m_duration > 0)
5026  spawnCreature->SetDuration(m_duration);
5027 
5028  CreatureInfo const* cInfo = spawnCreature->GetCreatureInfo();
5029 
5030  // spawnCreature->SetName(""); // generated by client
5031  spawnCreature->SetOwnerGuid(m_caster->GetObjectGuid());
5032  spawnCreature->SetUInt32Value(UNIT_FIELD_FLAGS, cInfo->UnitFlags);
5033  spawnCreature->SetUInt32Value(UNIT_NPC_FLAGS, cInfo->NpcFlags);
5034  spawnCreature->setFaction(m_caster->GetFaction());
5035  spawnCreature->SetUInt32Value(UNIT_FIELD_PET_NAME_TIMESTAMP, 0);
5036  spawnCreature->SetUInt32Value(UNIT_CREATED_BY_SPELL, m_spellInfo->Id);
5037 
5038  spawnCreature->SetCanModifyStats(true);
5039  spawnCreature->InitStatsForLevel(level);
5040 
5041  if (m_caster->HasFlag(UNIT_FIELD_FLAGS, UNIT_FLAG_PLAYER_CONTROLLED))
5042  {
5043  spawnCreature->SetFlag(UNIT_FIELD_FLAGS, UNIT_FLAG_PLAYER_CONTROLLED);
5044  spawnCreature->SetByteValue(UNIT_FIELD_BYTES_2, UNIT_BYTES_2_OFFSET_DEBUFF_LIMIT, UNIT_BYTE2_PLAYER_CONTROLLED_DEBUFF_LIMIT);
5045  }
5046  else
5047  spawnCreature->SetByteValue(UNIT_FIELD_BYTES_2, UNIT_BYTES_2_OFFSET_DEBUFF_LIMIT, UNIT_BYTE2_CREATURE_DEBUFF_LIMIT);
5048 
5049  if (m_caster->IsImmuneToNPC())
5050  spawnCreature->SetImmuneToNPC(true);
5051 
5052  if (m_caster->IsImmuneToPlayer())
5053  spawnCreature->SetImmuneToPlayer(true);
5054 
5055  if (m_caster->IsPvP())
5056  spawnCreature->SetPvP(true);
5057 
5058  if (CharmInfo* charmInfo = spawnCreature->GetCharmInfo())
5059  charmInfo->SetPetNumber(pet_number, false);
5060 
5061  // only done for guardians out of all pets - rest come from db tables
5062  if (spawnCreature->GetCreatureInfo()->SpellList)
5063  spawnCreature->SetSpellList(spawnCreature->GetCreatureInfo()->SpellList);
5064 
5065  spawnCreature->SetLoading(false);
5066  m_caster->AddGuardian(spawnCreature);
5067  }
5068 
5069  return true;
5070 }
5071 
5072 
5073 void Spell::EffectTeleUnitsFaceCaster(SpellEffectIndex /*eff_idx*/)
5074 {
5075  if (!unitTarget)
5076  return;
5077 
5078  if (unitTarget->IsTaxiFlying())
5079  return;
5080 
5081  float x, y, z;
5082  if (m_targets.m_targetMask & TARGET_FLAG_DEST_LOCATION)
5083  m_targets.getDestination(x, y, z);
5084  else
5085  return;
5086 
5087  unitTarget->NearTeleportTo(x, y, z, -m_caster->GetOrientation(), unitTarget == m_caster);
5088 }
5089 
5090 void Spell::EffectLearnSkill(SpellEffectIndex eff_idx)
5091 {
5092  if (unitTarget->GetTypeId() != TYPEID_PLAYER)
5093  return;
5094 
5095  if (damage < 0)
5096  return;
5097 
5098  Player* target = static_cast<Player*>(unitTarget);
5099 
5100  uint16 skillid = uint16(m_spellInfo->EffectMiscValue[eff_idx]);
5101  uint16 step = uint16(damage);
5102  target->SetSkillStep(skillid, step);
5103 
5104  if (WorldObject const* caster = GetCastingObject())
5105  DEBUG_LOG("Spell: %s teaches %s skill %u (to step %u)", caster->GetGuidStr().c_str(), target->GetGuidStr().c_str(), skillid, step);
5106 }
5107 
5108 void Spell::EffectAddHonor(SpellEffectIndex /*eff_idx*/)
5109 {
5110  if (unitTarget->GetTypeId() != TYPEID_PLAYER)
5111  return;
5112 
5113  // 2.4.3 honor-spells don't scale with level and won't be casted by an item
5114  // also we must use damage+1 (spelldescription says +25 honor but damage is only 24)
5115  ((Player*)unitTarget)->RewardHonor(nullptr, 1, float(damage + 1));
5116  DEBUG_FILTER_LOG(LOG_FILTER_SPELL_CAST, "SpellEffect::AddHonor (spell_id %u) rewards %u honor points (non scale) for player: %u", m_spellInfo->Id, damage, ((Player*)unitTarget)->GetGUIDLow());
5117 }
5118 
5119 void Spell::EffectSpawn(SpellEffectIndex /*eff_idx*/)
5120 {
5121  // Previously used by 15750 26262 34115 - noting for posterity
5122  m_caster->RemoveFlag(UNIT_FIELD_FLAGS, UNIT_FLAG_SPAWNING);
5123 }
5124 
5125 void Spell::EffectTradeSkill(SpellEffectIndex /*eff_idx*/)
5126 {
5127  if (unitTarget->GetTypeId() != TYPEID_PLAYER)
5128  return;
5129  // uint32 skillid = m_spellInfo->EffectMiscValue[i];
5130  // uint16 skillmax = ((Player*)unitTarget)->(skillid);
5131  // ((Player*)unitTarget)->SetSkill(skillid,skillval?skillval:1,skillmax+75);
5132 }
5133 
5134 void Spell::EffectEnchantItemPerm(SpellEffectIndex eff_idx)
5135 {
5136  if (m_caster->GetTypeId() != TYPEID_PLAYER)
5137  return;
5138  if (!itemTarget)
5139  return;
5140 
5141  Player* p_caster = (Player*)m_caster;
5142 
5143  // not grow at item use at item case
5144  p_caster->UpdateCraftSkill(m_spellInfo->Id);
5145 
5146  uint32 enchant_id = m_spellInfo->EffectMiscValue[eff_idx];
5147  if (!enchant_id)
5148  return;
5149 
5150  SpellItemEnchantmentEntry const* pEnchant = sSpellItemEnchantmentStore.LookupEntry(enchant_id);
5151  if (!pEnchant)
5152  return;
5153 
5154  // item can be in trade slot and have owner diff. from caster
5155  Player* item_owner = itemTarget->GetOwner();
5156  if (!item_owner)
5157  return;
5158 
5159  if (item_owner != p_caster && p_caster->GetSession()->GetSecurity() > SEC_PLAYER && sWorld.getConfig(CONFIG_BOOL_GM_LOG_TRADE))
5160  {
5161  sLog.outCommand(p_caster->GetSession()->GetAccountId(), "GM %s (Account: %u) enchanting(perm): %s (Entry: %d) for player: %s (Account: %u)",
5162  p_caster->GetName(), p_caster->GetSession()->GetAccountId(),
5163  itemTarget->GetProto()->Name1, itemTarget->GetEntry(),
5164  item_owner->GetName(), item_owner->GetSession()->GetAccountId());
5165  }
5166 
5167  // remove old enchanting before applying new if equipped
5168  item_owner->ApplyEnchantment(itemTarget, PERM_ENCHANTMENT_SLOT, false);
5169 
5170  itemTarget->SetEnchantment(PERM_ENCHANTMENT_SLOT, enchant_id, 0, 0, m_caster->GetObjectGuid());
5171 
5172  // add new enchanting if equipped
5173  item_owner->ApplyEnchantment(itemTarget, PERM_ENCHANTMENT_SLOT, true);
5174 }
5175 
5176 void Spell::EffectEnchantItemTmp(SpellEffectIndex eff_idx)
5177 {
5178  if (m_caster->GetTypeId() != TYPEID_PLAYER)
5179  return;
5180  if (!itemTarget)
5181  return;
5182 
5183  Player* p_caster = (Player*)m_caster;
5184 
5185  uint32 enchant_id = m_spellInfo->EffectMiscValue[eff_idx];
5186 
5187  // Shaman Rockbiter Weapon
5188  if (eff_idx == EFFECT_INDEX_0 && m_spellInfo->Effect[EFFECT_INDEX_1] == SPELL_EFFECT_DUMMY)
5189  {
5190  int32 enchanting_damage = m_currentBasePoints[EFFECT_INDEX_1];
5191 
5192  // enchanting id selected by calculated damage-per-sec stored in Effect[1] base value
5193  // with already applied percent bonus from Elemental Weapons talent
5194  // Note: damage calculated (correctly) with rounding int32(float(v)) but
5195  // RW enchantments applied damage int32(float(v)+0.5), this create 0..1 difference sometime
5196  switch (enchanting_damage)
5197  {
5198  // Rank 1
5199  case 2: enchant_id = 29; break; // 0% [ 7% == 2, 14% == 2, 20% == 2]
5200  // Rank 2
5201  case 4: enchant_id = 6; break; // 0% [ 7% == 4, 14% == 4]
5202  case 5: enchant_id = 3025; break; // 20%
5203  // Rank 3
5204  case 6: enchant_id = 1; break; // 0% [ 7% == 6, 14% == 6]
5205  case 7: enchant_id = 3027; break; // 20%
5206  // Rank 4
5207  case 9: enchant_id = 3032; break; // 0% [ 7% == 6]
5208  case 10: enchant_id = 503; break; // 14%
5209  case 11: enchant_id = 3031; break; // 20%
5210  // Rank 5
5211  case 15: enchant_id = 3035; break; // 0%
5212  case 16: enchant_id = 1663; break; // 7%
5213  case 17: enchant_id = 3033; break; // 14%
5214  case 18: enchant_id = 3034; break; // 20%
5215  // Rank 6
5216  case 28: enchant_id = 3038; break; // 0%
5217  case 29: enchant_id = 683; break; // 7%
5218  case 31: enchant_id = 3036; break; // 14%
5219  case 33: enchant_id = 3037; break; // 20%
5220  // Rank 7
5221  case 40: enchant_id = 3041; break; // 0%
5222  case 42: enchant_id = 1664; break; // 7%
5223  case 45: enchant_id = 3039; break; // 14%
5224  case 48: enchant_id = 3040; break; // 20%
